In every challenge I see an opportunity to grow and continue learning. 📈🚀

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Project Controller | Risk Analysis | Delay Analysis | 4D Planning Simulation | Planning | Cost Control
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: February 3, 2025, Muhammad Usman worked with Laura on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: I had the pleasure of working with Laura and she consistently impressed me with her proactive and collaborative approach. She was always ready to help, quick to take action, and had a talent for thinking ahead to anticipate needs and challenges. Her ability to work seamlessly with other teams and departments fostered a positive and efficient work environment. Laura is a true team player and a valuable asset to any organization.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Socio gerente en ACI-Consult
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: January 19, 2025, Ricardo managed Laura directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
En ACI-Consult valoramos mucho contar con la colaboración de Laura.
Nos ha apoyado en contratos complejos, con clientes exigentes, consiguiendo interiorizarse en poco tiempo y aportando ideas y entregando respuestas precisas. 
Más allá de sus sólidos conocimientos legales, adaptados a diferentes legislaciones, nos ha apoyado gestionando proyectos y coordinando hábilmente equipos de trabajo.
Considero que es una profesional muy responsable y confiable, que soporta gran carga de trabajo, siempre con excelente predisposición.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Director bei Delta Consulting Group
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: January 8, 2025, Christian worked with Laura on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
Laura and I worked together for an international contractor on the construction of a hydropower plant in Chile as contract administrators and later in support of an ICC Arbitration.
Her strong legal background paired with the ability to learn and process construction matters quickly made her an excellent contract administrator and an essential part of our team.
She managed with ease any cultural or linguistic barriers in an international environment.
Laura is very dedicated to her work, eager to learn, with a fantastic team spirit, and fits into any cross-functional team. 
I would not hesitate to recommend her for any role.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Senior Geotechnical Geologist (Freelance)
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: January 8, 2025, Santiago worked with Laura but they were at different companies
receivedRecommendations.description:
Colaboré con Laura en dos ocasiones. Primero en el Proyecto Alto Maipo en Chile, donde Laura era Contract Administrator y yo era subcontratista. En esa ocasión ella realizaba el seguimiento de los contratos, siempre dispuesta a responder consultas contractuales. Luego en un arbitraje internacional, donde participé como geólogo experto.
Laura es una profesional detallista, con habilidad para resolver problemas, y que además destaca por crear ambientes de trabajo colaborativos y positivos.
Fue una gran experiencia colaborar con Laura tanto a nivel profesional como personal.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Gestión Ambiental y Gestión de Permisos
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: January 7, 2025, Carolina worked with Laura on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: Trabajé con Laura cuando ella era Contract Administrator en el Proyecto Alto Maipo. En su trabajo demostró alta habilidad para resolver las dudas contractuales de manera clara y rápida, y siempre estaba con una actitud proactiva y en pos al trabajo en equipo. Fue un placer trabajar con ella!

headline: Sales engineer with technical advice. Frozen food and chocolate. Food legislation
about:
I work with food process engineering, which is a field I find extremely interesting and I consider myself fortunate for being able to work with something I have a personal interest and passion for. In the past years I have had the opportunity to travel the world and meet very interesting people, both professionals, who have later become my friends, from whose I have learned and kept continuing  learning. I am an engineer specialised in frozen food industries with a Master of Science in food technology with a extensive experience at working in smaller and multinational companies located in Europe, America and Australia. My field of expertise is frozen food, and chocolate production in which I have worked as a consultant both of production/technical processes and development, and the training of staff. Selling to industrial customers with technical advice, has been one of the Jobs I liked most. To achieve the professional goals I have set for myself I am under a continuous learning process in which I gladly put in the effort and work for further developing and increase of my understanding for my field. I do this so that I can offer my clients the needed confidence, flexibility, availability and geographic adaptation, they are seeking for their projects development.
I do also dedicate my time in trading, in futures on the Chicago stock exchange, USA.
E-mail:  willgotz@gmail.com

experience.description: It is to buy or sell futures contracts, specializing in Stock market Indices, commodities and currencies.

Advice on quality control, and special dietary foods, celiac, allergens, develop your ice cream  factory.
www.restaurantegarum.com

Advisor quality control and equipment, new product development, food law, and corporate education.
www.elpiave.com

As owner, I have dedicated to the manufacture of artisan ice cream, Neapolitan-style (using seasonal fruits), and teaching this craft in extinction, especially watching your presentation, served in cones with palette knife, as traditionally done in Italy.

As a teacher, teaching food freezing using cryogenic liquids applied to the food industry and catering.
www.xarxadecentresdeturisme.com

Processing and factory of High quality chocolates, pralines, confectionery and chocolate Easter eggs.
www.unaltravolta.com.ar

Design laboratory for quality control and development od new egg products. We make cooked (hard) and shelled eggs, and also in bars (cylindrical) is used in the meals of airlines and restaurants, (frozen) with various additives and flavors or flavorings and eggs chopped (for sandwiches industry), liquid pasteurized and frozen eggs omellet, and dried egg powder. We are developing the manufacture of angel hair eggs and also frozen.
www.artesanias-avicolas.com.ar
Design of the laboratory, analytical quality and microbiological control, design, installation and operation of his own ice cream Factory.

Here, my job was to unify the various factories belonging to the flia. Bortolot order to achieve better competitiveness, are distributed worldwide in Argentina, Germany, Italy, USA, Spain. I think I have achieved in these years, this very difficult goals. They are manufacturers of premium quality ice creams.
www.elpiave.com.ar

Development of quality and microbiological control laboratory, and new products. Company dedicated to food ingredients powder only, as a stabilizer of ice cream, custards, baking powder, jelly powder, nutritional supplements for athletes, egg powder, additives farináceo industry and the dairy industry in general, etc. Especially visiting the industrial customers for, sale with personalized technical advice.
www.pulver.com.ar

Ice cream factory located in the north of Buenos Aires, developing its quality and microbiological control laboratory and new products. I intervened in the formulation and reformulation of many of the ice cream, as manufactured only with milk of Jersey cows, which come from own´s dairy farms,  establishment San Isidro Labrador. Also adapting manufacturing facilities to the new requirements of production expansion.
www.munchis.com.ar

I designed and supervise the laboratory of quality and the microbiological control, and development of new products. It was the largest craftsmanship factory of ice cream that existed in the world, with batch fabrication machines. I designed and put into operation the chocolate Factory, for self supply. In USA,  I bought the equipment for breaking eggs (Seymour), for their own consumption, separating the white and yolk of the egg shell, previously cleaned and disinfected, since in those years we used only organic or ecological eggs. I´ve also worked in the international expansion, combining and reconciles the different food legislation, in America, Europe and Australia. In the last stage, I have worked in Denmark, in companies Hoyer (Tetra Pak International), Grinsted (Brabrand) and Gram (in Vojens), adapting the formulations of the artisan ice cream, with batch manufacturing to continuous production.

Advisor quality control and equipment, new product development, food law, and corporate education.
www.laveneciana.com.ar

Attending (Mr Morten Ernst) technically installation and set up of egg breaking equipment to obtain liquid egg, widely used in the food industry. In 1989 I was training me in Ovotec in Odense, Denmark.
http://www.sanovogroup.com/SANOVO.2060.aspx
Development laboratory and quality control of new products. Specializing in the production of all types of margarines, industrial factory use.

element.headline: Sales engineer with technical advice. Frozen food and chocolate. Food legislation
element.about:
I work with food process engineering, which is a field I find extremely interesting and I consider myself fortunate for being able to work with something I have a personal interest and passion for. In the past years I have had the opportunity to travel the world and meet very interesting people, both professionals, who have later become my friends, from whose I have learned and kept continuing  learning. I am an engineer specialised in frozen food industries with a Master of Science in food technology with a extensive experience at working in smaller and multinational companies located in Europe, America and Australia. My field of expertise is frozen food, and chocolate production in which I have worked as a consultant both of production/technical processes and development, and the training of staff. Selling to industrial customers with technical advice, has been one of the Jobs I liked most. To achieve the professional goals I have set for myself I am under a continuous learning process in which I gladly put in the effort and work for further developing and increase of my understanding for my field. I do this so that I can offer my clients the needed confidence, flexibility, availability and geographic adaptation, they are seeking for their projects development.
I do also dedicate my time in trading, in futures on the Chicago stock exchange, USA.
E-mail:  willgotz@gmail.com

experience.description: It is to buy or sell futures contracts, specializing in Stock market Indices, commodities and currencies.

Advice on quality control, and special dietary foods, celiac, allergens, develop your ice cream  factory.
www.restaurantegarum.com

Advisor quality control and equipment, new product development, food law, and corporate education.
www.elpiave.com

As owner, I have dedicated to the manufacture of artisan ice cream, Neapolitan-style (using seasonal fruits), and teaching this craft in extinction, especially watching your presentation, served in cones with palette knife, as traditionally done in Italy.

As a teacher, teaching food freezing using cryogenic liquids applied to the food industry and catering.
www.xarxadecentresdeturisme.com

Processing and factory of High quality chocolates, pralines, confectionery and chocolate Easter eggs.
www.unaltravolta.com.ar

Design laboratory for quality control and development od new egg products. We make cooked (hard) and shelled eggs, and also in bars (cylindrical) is used in the meals of airlines and restaurants, (frozen) with various additives and flavors or flavorings and eggs chopped (for sandwiches industry), liquid pasteurized and frozen eggs omellet, and dried egg powder. We are developing the manufacture of angel hair eggs and also frozen.
www.artesanias-avicolas.com.ar
Design of the laboratory, analytical quality and microbiological control, design, installation and operation of his own ice cream Factory.

Here, my job was to unify the various factories belonging to the flia. Bortolot order to achieve better competitiveness, are distributed worldwide in Argentina, Germany, Italy, USA, Spain. I think I have achieved in these years, this very difficult goals. They are manufacturers of premium quality ice creams.
www.elpiave.com.ar

Development of quality and microbiological control laboratory, and new products. Company dedicated to food ingredients powder only, as a stabilizer of ice cream, custards, baking powder, jelly powder, nutritional supplements for athletes, egg powder, additives farináceo industry and the dairy industry in general, etc. Especially visiting the industrial customers for, sale with personalized technical advice.
www.pulver.com.ar

Ice cream factory located in the north of Buenos Aires, developing its quality and microbiological control laboratory and new products. I intervened in the formulation and reformulation of many of the ice cream, as manufactured only with milk of Jersey cows, which come from own´s dairy farms,  establishment San Isidro Labrador. Also adapting manufacturing facilities to the new requirements of production expansion.
www.munchis.com.ar

I designed and supervise the laboratory of quality and the microbiological control, and development of new products. It was the largest craftsmanship factory of ice cream that existed in the world, with batch fabrication machines. I designed and put into operation the chocolate Factory, for self supply. In USA,  I bought the equipment for breaking eggs (Seymour), for their own consumption, separating the white and yolk of the egg shell, previously cleaned and disinfected, since in those years we used only organic or ecological eggs. I´ve also worked in the international expansion, combining and reconciles the different food legislation, in America, Europe and Australia. In the last stage, I have worked in Denmark, in companies Hoyer (Tetra Pak International), Grinsted (Brabrand) and Gram (in Vojens), adapting the formulations of the artisan ice cream, with batch manufacturing to continuous production.

headline: Translation Project Manager
about: Localization Project Manager with years of experience in the Translation and Localization industry. Great capability for multitasking and problem solving. Ability to manage and prioritize tasks oriented towards achieving different goals for the company, and in a professional level. Team player, collaborative, responsible, and reliable, always willing to help.

experience.description:
Planning, organizing and monitoring localization projects independently, ensuring consistency with timelines, quality and budgeted expenses.
Localization asset preparation, coordination, communication and management between divisions/departments and external vendors.

Coordination and management of translation projects, as well as training and supervision of new Project Managers in the team.
Contact and negotiation with clients, as well as quoting, invoicing and quality checking on final deliveries.

Coordination and management of translation projects.
Contact and negotiation with linguists, and quality checking on the final delivery to client.
Traducción especializada en los siguientes campos: Informática, Gaming, Tecnología, Marketing, Recursos Humanos y campos generales.
Traducción desde un puesto interno en la agencia de traducción; recepción de textos del cliente y traducción de estos, para la posterior edición y entrega al cliente.
Control de calidad de las llamadas de call centers recibidas por los representantes de atención al cliente de la empresa de telecomunicaciones Suddenlink en los Estados Unidos.
Administración de la biblioteca del instituto binacional. Manejo de material bilingüe (inglés y español) y registro y entrega de material a socios y alumnos de la institución.
Recepción y asistencia a turistas en centro de ski con el fin de ofrecer un servicio de primer nivel.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Conference Interpreter | Spanish-English-Portuguese | IIRR 🌎 Medicine 🩺 Wellbeing and Motivational Speech 💫 Engineering 🛠️ Design 👠
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: December 18, 2019, Victoria and Santiago studied together
receivedRecommendations.description: Santiago fue un gran amigo y compañero de estudios, comprometido y responsable. Formamos un excelente equipo de trabajo colaborativo. Además de ser un excelente profesional y ser impecable en sus trabajos especializados, es responsable y detallista. Con orgullo, lo llamo mi colega.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Director of Marketing at Terra Translations
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: August 13, 2015, Carolina worked with Santiago on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: Santiago es un excelente traductor, colega y persona. Siempre que he tenido algún problema informático me ha asistido rápida y efectivamente, lo que es sumamente valioso cuando hay proyectos con entregas urgentes. En oportunidades hemos debatido dudas en materia de traducción y sus opiniones me han sido de mucha utilidad. ¡Es un gusto poder contar con alguien así!

headline: CEO Conexion Valencia * Communication and HR Specialist
about:
CEO & Agente Inmobiliaria Colegiada en Conexión Valencia | Expert | Inversión Residencial & Relocation

Soy María Luz Hamparsomian, profesional inmobiliaria con enfoque estratégico, apasionada por conectar a clientes internacionales (particularmente familias y emprendedores) con oportunidades de inversión en Valencia y la Comunidad Valenciana.

Desde 2020, tras establecerme junto a mi familia desde Argentina, fundé Conexión Valencia, agencia especializada en gestión integral de inversiones inmobiliarias. En pocos años, hemos liderado transacciones valoradas en millones de euros en ventas y alquileres, con especial énfasis en la gestión integral del alquiler asegurando la rentabilidad para nuestros inversores y propietarios.

Mi enfoque profesional combina:

→ Análisis personalizado del mercado: evaluación de oportunidades de inversión con visión realista y sostenible.

→ Negociación avanzada y cierre de operaciones: representación directa del cliente con ética, claridad y resultados.

→ Comunicación efectiva y marketing inmobiliario: difusión estratégica de propiedades en múltiples canales, captación de compradores e inversores.

→ Asesoramiento multicultural: facilitación de trámites migratorios, legales y sociales para expatriados que invierten o se asientan en España.

Gracias a mi doble experiencia en Marketing, Comunicación y Recursos Humanos junto al sector inmobiliario, brindamos a través de Conexión Valencia y nuestra red de profesionales de confianza, un servicio completo en cada etapa de su proceso de inversión y migratorio. 

Mi mayor satisfacción profesional es ver a los clientes alcanzar sus metas: ya sea comprar su primera vivienda, rentabilizar un inmueble o invertir en un proyecto con impacto a largo plazo.

¿Quieres invertir, alquilar o vender en la Comunidad Valenciana?
Con Verdad, Transparencia y Proyección, transformo cada propiedad en una oportunidad.

📩 Hablemos: conecta conmigo info@conexionvalencia.com o descubre más en conexionvalencia.com

experience.description:
Asesoramiento inmobiliario para inversionistas. 
Gestión de alquileres temporales y de la larga estancia. 
Alquileres a distancia y servicios de relocación.

En Conexión Valencia somos agentes inmobiliarios asociados al Colegio Profesional de Agentes Inmobiliarios de Valencia (API/APIVA), con seguro de responsabilidad profesional vigente e inscritos en el Registro de Agentes Inmobiliarios de la Generalitat Valenciana (RAICV 1028).

Marketing, HR and Communication advisory. 
Indoor and outdoors training for business.
Recruitment for key positions. 
Communication and digital business auditor.
Advisory for start ups.

More information and resources in luzhamparsomian.com

Vistage S.A. es una organización internacional que provee desarrollo y aprendizaje continuo para los Número Uno de empresas. 
Se inicia en 1957 en los Estados Unidos de Norteamérica y en 2000 se instala en la República Argentina de la mano de su actual Presidente señor Alejo Canton.
El primer Grupo Vistage fue fundado sobre la premisa de que los empresarios se beneficiarían significativamente con un intercambio formal de experiencias con sus pares de negocios.
Hoy en día, Vistage abarca el mundo con más de quince mil miembros repartidos en dieciséis países. 
En forma conjunta, los Miembros Vistage manejan compañías que reúnen más de doscientos mil millones de dólares en ventas anuales y emplean a más de un millón de personas.

Brindamos servicios de comunicación y marketing a clientes corporativos de diversas industrias tales como: construcción, inversiones, retail, indumentaria, capacitación, consultoría etc. 

Generando planes integrales y completamente personalizados, diseñando herramientas para contribuir desde la comunicación a lograr los objetivos de negocio. Algunos de nuestros servicios son:
- Prensa y relaciones con los medios de comunicación.
- Gestión de redes sociales.
- Marketing.
- Comunicación Institucional.
- Responsabilidad Social Empresaria.
- Comunicación Interna y asesoramiento en RRHH.
- Comunicaciones de crisis y risk management.
- Publicidad on y off line.
- Monitoreo de medios.
- Organización de eventos y diseño.
- Capacitación y formación.

Algunos de nuestros clientes: Grabatto, Arquinova, Grow Up Desarrollos e Inversiones, Ingouville Nelson & Asociados, Área 60, Lenor Group, Comar Pisos, Eatell, Estilo Bebé, Alena Eventos, Acqua Buceo, InfoAval, Caminos ConTacto, La Huella, Chocolate Colonial, Rondi Juguetes, American Vart, PlotterDoc, etc.

Área: EDITORIAL (Jefa deVentas)
Personal al cargo: 7 vendedores regionales – 2 analistas
- Redistribución de tareas y organización del sector.
- Capacitación del personal en función de las tareas a desarrollar.
- Implementación de modificaciones (conjuntamente con el área de sistemas) y mejoras en los diferentes sistemas de gestión, para optimizar la dinámica de los procedimientos realizados y mejorar el control cruzado.
- Armado de instructivos y rearmado del archivo.
- Atención de grandes cuentas y realización/delegación de tareas propias de la administración de ventas: notas de crédito, notas de debito, facturaciones especiales, entre otras.
- Coordinación de las actividades logísticas.
- Estrategias de ventas y establecimiento de objetivos del sector.
- Estadísticas y análisis de información.
- Control, supervisión y evaluaciones de desempeño.

Junio 2008 – Mayo 2010: 
Área: ADMINISTRACIÓN DE VENTAS (Analista Sr.):
Comunicación Interna y Externa (Mailing estratégico, cartas a clientes, listas de precios, anuncios especiales, creación de material promocional, etc.). 
Key User CRM: Diseño de circuitos e implementación de sistema símil CRM para el área de pharma (Vía Intranet). Soporte a usuarios, talleres de capacitación y desarrollo de manuales de uso.
Diseño de contenidos de pagina web, dentro de la intranet del área.
Carga de pedidos, armado de cotizaciones, facturación, realización de notas de crédito –débito, quality notifications, etc.  (mediante el sistema SAP).
Alta, modificación y baja de clientes en el maestro (mediante el sistema SAP y formularios internos).
Generación de manuales, instructivos, políticas y SOP’s de los procesos del sector.
Generación de Reportes (Tablero de Comando – Sistema de mejora continua).
Encuesta de Satisfacción al cliente interno y externo (diseño, aplicación y elaboración de los resultados para las áreas de negocios y para la gerencia).

Mayo 2007 – Junio 2008: 
Asistencia al Gerente de Recursos Humanos: Traducciones, Compra de pasajes aéreos, Reservas de alojamiento, Liquidación de gastos (mensuales, en concepto de viajes y tarjetas de crédito corporativas). Envío de mails y correspondencia a la corporación, Tramites personales. Realización de presentaciones en Power Point. Organización de eventos internos.

Compensaciones y Beneficios:
Administración de los beneficios del personal interno (Regalos corporativos, Administración del seguro de vida optativo, etc.). Actualización y mantenimiento de legajos. 
Job descriptions, armado y actualización a través reuniones con los distintos equipos de trabajo. 
Reportes a casa matriz (Alemania).
Comunicación Interna (actualización de carteleras, mailing interno, canalización de sugerencias, atención de workflows internos, intranet (start up y mantenimiento).
Manuales de procedimientos. Políticas internas.

Trabajé muy de cerca con Luz en Merck, en un proyecto de automatización de procesos del área de Administración de Ventas utilizando tecnologías de workflow. Fue una gran satisfacción para mí tenerla en el equipo del lado del negocio, ya que su iniciativa, su creatividad, su perseverancia y su compromiso con la calidad de los productos que estábamos desarrollando, fueron decisivos para el éxito de ese proyecto.
Luz no se conforma con resultados "aceptables". Quiere lo mejor, y no se detiene hasta que lo consigue.

receivedRecommendations.description:

En lo personal Luz, cuenta con una excelente calidad humana, amplia flexibilidad y respeto que favorecen el cumplimiento de tareas grupales de alto desempeño.
En lo profesional, si bien no ´formó parte directa de mi equipo observo un desarrollo rápido de sus habilidades habiendo logrado desarrollarse rápidante dentro de Merck y realizar su tarea actual con excelentes resultados.

element.headline: CEO Conexion Valencia * Communication and HR Specialist
element.about:
CEO & Agente Inmobiliaria Colegiada en Conexión Valencia | Expert | Inversión Residencial & Relocation

Soy María Luz Hamparsomian, profesional inmobiliaria con enfoque estratégico, apasionada por conectar a clientes internacionales (particularmente familias y emprendedores) con oportunidades de inversión en Valencia y la Comunidad Valenciana.

Desde 2020, tras establecerme junto a mi familia desde Argentina, fundé Conexión Valencia, agencia especializada en gestión integral de inversiones inmobiliarias. En pocos años, hemos liderado transacciones valoradas en millones de euros en ventas y alquileres, con especial énfasis en la gestión integral del alquiler asegurando la rentabilidad para nuestros inversores y propietarios.

Mi enfoque profesional combina:

→ Análisis personalizado del mercado: evaluación de oportunidades de inversión con visión realista y sostenible.

→ Negociación avanzada y cierre de operaciones: representación directa del cliente con ética, claridad y resultados.

→ Comunicación efectiva y marketing inmobiliario: difusión estratégica de propiedades en múltiples canales, captación de compradores e inversores.

→ Asesoramiento multicultural: facilitación de trámites migratorios, legales y sociales para expatriados que invierten o se asientan en España.

Gracias a mi doble experiencia en Marketing, Comunicación y Recursos Humanos junto al sector inmobiliario, brindamos a través de Conexión Valencia y nuestra red de profesionales de confianza, un servicio completo en cada etapa de su proceso de inversión y migratorio. 

Mi mayor satisfacción profesional es ver a los clientes alcanzar sus metas: ya sea comprar su primera vivienda, rentabilizar un inmueble o invertir en un proyecto con impacto a largo plazo.

¿Quieres invertir, alquilar o vender en la Comunidad Valenciana?
Con Verdad, Transparencia y Proyección, transformo cada propiedad en una oportunidad.

📩 Hablemos: conecta conmigo info@conexionvalencia.com o descubre más en conexionvalencia.com

headline: CPO @ Subgen AI | Technological Solutions powered by AI
about:
Leandro Harillo is CPO at Subgen AI, a company that leverages artificial intelligence to create state-of-the-art digital products, and to optimize business processes. With over 20 years of experience as a technological entrepreneur, he has co-founded and grown several technology-based companies across various sectors, such as agritech production, shared economies, medical education, and IoT-based retail automation. He is passionate about transforming industries through technological innovation and creating value for businesses and society.

As a CPO, Leandro oversees and leads the development of Serenity* Star, an innovative AI ecosystem that unleashes the potential of Generative AI in startups, SMEs, corporations, and governments. He also works closely with the CEO and other business leaders to align the product vision and strategy with the company's goals and values. Drawing on his extensive technical and business skills, he manages and coordinates the efforts of a talented and diverse team of product managers, engineers, designers, and researchers. Furthermore, he shared his expertise and insights as a professor at EOI (Spain), a renowned institution in the field of business education, where he taught students about the application of cutting-edge technologies and digital transformation strategies in various industries.

experience.description:
EOI (Escuela de Organización Industrial) is a renowned institution in the field of business education, offering world-class Master's and postgraduate programs that equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary to excel in today's competitive business landscape.

In his role as a professor at EOI, Leandro Harillo contributes to this prestigious institution's commitment to excellence by sharing his extensive experience and expertise in the technology and innovation sectors. Drawing from his real-world experiences in creating and growing technology-based companies, Leandro teaches students about the application of cutting-edge technologies and digital transformation strategies in various industries.

Leandro's courses at EOI focus on areas such as technological innovation, digital transformation, and the application of technology to design and redesign business models. By providing students with practical insights and hands-on examples, Leandro helps them develop the skills required to drive innovation and foster growth in their future careers. His passion for technology and innovation, combined with his strong commitment to education, make Leandro an important asset to the EOI community and an asset in shaping the next generation of business leaders.

BINIT is a leading technology development company with 150+ employees and offices in Spain, Brazil, Argentina, and Uruguay, focused on providing and co-creating innovative technological platforms to transform a wide range of industries.

In his role as CTO at BINIT, Leandro Harillo plays a pivotal role in shaping and implementing the company's technological vision. Drawing on his extensive experience and technical skills, Leandro oversees and leads the research and development of innovative technological solutions to meet BINIT's clients' needs. Furthermore, he works closely with other business leaders to ensure the strategic alignment of technology and business goals.

Leandro is responsible for managing and coordinating the efforts of engineering and software development teams, ensuring quality and efficiency in the delivery of products and services. He also takes charge of maintaining a robust, scalable, and secure technology architecture, as well as overseeing the adoption of industry best practices and emerging technology trends.

As the CTO of BINIT, Leandro is also committed to fostering a culture of innovation and continuous learning among employees. Through his leadership, he drives the growth and development of highly skilled and dedicated professionals who work together to fulfill BINIT's mission of transforming industries and assisting businesses in reaching their goals through technological innovation.

experience.location: Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina
experience.description: At ITBA (Instituto Tecnológico de Buenos Aires), a leading institution in technological education, Leandro Harillo embraced his role as a Master Degree Thesis Tutor, guiding and mentoring students through their thesis projects. Leveraging his extensive experience in technology and innovation, Leandro assisted students in identifying pertinent research topics, formulating hypotheses, and designing impactful studies. By imparting his knowledge and insights, he helped students develop vital research skills and fostered an understanding of real-world applications for technology and digital transformation across industries. Committed to shaping the future of aspiring technologists, Leandro played a crucial role in nurturing the next generation of innovative thinkers.

- Oversaw management of out-sourced IT developments and resources.

publications.title: Script concordance testing in continuing professional development: local or international reference panels?
publications.publishedAt: Advances in Health Sciences Education · Nov 1, 2012
publications.description: Aims To examine the psychometric consequences of pooling the responses of panelists from different countries (composite panels) and the effect of increasing composite panel size. Method 97 cardiologists in Mexico answered a set of 62 PSCT cases/305 questions. A local panel was recruited in Mexico (n = 7). Other panelists were recruited in Argentina (n = 10) and Brazil (n = 11). Together they constituted a composite panel of 28 experts. Random panels of reference of increasing sizes (5, 10, 15, 20, and 25) were generated. Participants’ scores were computed for each panel sample. Units of analysis were means of participants’ scores per case. Discrimination, ranking and reliability of the scores obtained with each panel were estimated. Descriptive statistics, Pearson correlation coefficient, generalizability analysis, computation of Cronbach’s alpha were used in the analyses. Results Correlation coefficients between the local and the composite panels ranged from 0.951 to 0.981. Cronbach alpha coefficient values were above 0.85 for all panels. The value of the relative G coefficient from the generalizability analyses varied from 0.91 to 0.93, indicating very high and stable ranking of participants, though absolute value of scores increased with increasing composite panel size. Conclusions In CPD environments, and with panel members selected with the highest standards, composite panels can be used. Panels of all sizes yielded high psychometric qualities. Absolute scores should be interpreted with caution.

publications.title: Practicum Script Concordance Test, an online continuing professional development format to develop physicians’ reflexive skills
publications.publishedAt: Journal of Continuing Education in the Health Professions · Sep 1, 2012
publications.description:
Context

Web technology is well suited to elaborate trainings with qualities such as independent
learning, convenience, relevance, individualisation and self-testing. Practicum Script
Concordance Test (www.script.edu.es) is a continuing professional development (CPD) format
created to provide a ready-to-use tool that support health professionals in the development of
their reflexive clinical reasoning ability.

Method

Practicum Script Concordance Test CPD programs are provided across several Latin America
countries. In Mexico, a total of 1901 physicians were enrolled in these programs: 1349
paediatricians in the 2010-2011 cycle and 552 cardiologists in the 2011-2012 cycle. The
unfolding of a “Practicum Script Concordance Test” CPD daily activity and the characteristics of
the electronic platform are described. We then explain how feedback is provided and reflection
is promoted, then we depict the steps needed to elaborate and administer such programs.

Data on the demography of participants, on feasibility, on dropout rate, on use of on-line
tutors and of technical help as well as on physicians’ perceptions regarding the web-based SCT
learning model were collected with the use of a questionnaire survey.

Results

The online format was an important factor in the development and maintenance of the
programs. It facilitated construction of the huge item required banks, management of a large
number of experts from several countries to write, respond to and comment on test questions
and the practical - on a large scale - implementation of the CPD programs simultaneously in
different countries and specialties.

Conclusion
These data showed that the on-line Practicum Script Concordance Test CPD format is feasible
and acceptable. It can be used to induce reflection on reasoning tasks relevant to medical
practice. These results must be followed by studies on the impact of the format on physician
practice itself and ultimately on patient outcomes.

publications.title: Nuevos modelos de trabajo en la sociedad de la información.  Impacto en la calidad de vida de las personas. Desafíos y limitantes para las empresas en la Argentina.
publications.publishedAt: ITBA - EOI, Madrid, Spain · Aug 10, 2011
publications.description:
Tesis que recorre las distintas formas que han tomado los procesos de trabajo en nuestro presente reciente, desde los últimos tiempos de la era industrial a la presente sociedad del conocimiento.

Evalúa diferentes prácticas, como el teletrabajo, la flexibilidad laboral, nuevos modelos de contratación, incentivos y remuneraciones; en su abordaje se recorren diferentes planos, incluyendo aspectos tecnológicos, sociales, culturales normativos y jurídicos, donde el autor ha encontrado, en el plano doméstico, ciertas rigideces que podrían impedir la implementación. 

Se busca demostrar que las nuevas modalidades, posibles desde el plano de nuevas herramientas tecnológicas disponibles, permiten desarrollar modelos altamente beneficiosos en las relaciones: empresa, trabajador, familia y sociedad.

Recorre los paradigmas y mitos que se esconden detrás de nuestra cultura empresaria, y se analizará la manera en que estos limitan la aplicación de los nuevos modelos de trabajo en todo su potencial.

publications.title: Script concordance testing in continuing professional development: local or international reference panels?
publications.publishedAt: Advances in Health Sciences Education · Nov 1, 2012
publications.description: Aims To examine the psychometric consequences of pooling the responses of panelists from different countries (composite panels) and the effect of increasing composite panel size. Method 97 cardiologists in Mexico answered a set of 62 PSCT cases/305 questions. A local panel was recruited in Mexico (n = 7). Other panelists were recruited in Argentina (n = 10) and Brazil (n = 11). Together they constituted a composite panel of 28 experts. Random panels of reference of increasing sizes (5, 10, 15, 20, and 25) were generated. Participants’ scores were computed for each panel sample. Units of analysis were means of participants’ scores per case. Discrimination, ranking and reliability of the scores obtained with each panel were estimated. Descriptive statistics, Pearson correlation coefficient, generalizability analysis, computation of Cronbach’s alpha were used in the analyses. Results Correlation coefficients between the local and the composite panels ranged from 0.951 to 0.981. Cronbach alpha coefficient values were above 0.85 for all panels. The value of the relative G coefficient from the generalizability analyses varied from 0.91 to 0.93, indicating very high and stable ranking of participants, though absolute value of scores increased with increasing composite panel size. Conclusions In CPD environments, and with panel members selected with the highest standards, composite panels can be used. Panels of all sizes yielded high psychometric qualities. Absolute scores should be interpreted with caution.

publications.title: Practicum Script Concordance Test, an online continuing professional development format to develop physicians’ reflexive skills
publications.publishedAt: Journal of Continuing Education in the Health Professions · Sep 1, 2012
publications.description:
Context

Web technology is well suited to elaborate trainings with qualities such as independent
learning, convenience, relevance, individualisation and self-testing. Practicum Script
Concordance Test (www.script.edu.es) is a continuing professional development (CPD) format
created to provide a ready-to-use tool that support health professionals in the development of
their reflexive clinical reasoning ability.

Method

Practicum Script Concordance Test CPD programs are provided across several Latin America
countries. In Mexico, a total of 1901 physicians were enrolled in these programs: 1349
paediatricians in the 2010-2011 cycle and 552 cardiologists in the 2011-2012 cycle. The
unfolding of a “Practicum Script Concordance Test” CPD daily activity and the characteristics of
the electronic platform are described. We then explain how feedback is provided and reflection
is promoted, then we depict the steps needed to elaborate and administer such programs.

Data on the demography of participants, on feasibility, on dropout rate, on use of on-line
tutors and of technical help as well as on physicians’ perceptions regarding the web-based SCT
learning model were collected with the use of a questionnaire survey.

Results

The online format was an important factor in the development and maintenance of the
programs. It facilitated construction of the huge item required banks, management of a large
number of experts from several countries to write, respond to and comment on test questions
and the practical - on a large scale - implementation of the CPD programs simultaneously in
different countries and specialties.

Conclusion
These data showed that the on-line Practicum Script Concordance Test CPD format is feasible
and acceptable. It can be used to induce reflection on reasoning tasks relevant to medical
practice. These results must be followed by studies on the impact of the format on physician
practice itself and ultimately on patient outcomes.

publications.title: Nuevos modelos de trabajo en la sociedad de la información.  Impacto en la calidad de vida de las personas. Desafíos y limitantes para las empresas en la Argentina.
publications.publishedAt: ITBA - EOI, Madrid, Spain · Aug 10, 2011
publications.description:
Tesis que recorre las distintas formas que han tomado los procesos de trabajo en nuestro presente reciente, desde los últimos tiempos de la era industrial a la presente sociedad del conocimiento.

Evalúa diferentes prácticas, como el teletrabajo, la flexibilidad laboral, nuevos modelos de contratación, incentivos y remuneraciones; en su abordaje se recorren diferentes planos, incluyendo aspectos tecnológicos, sociales, culturales normativos y jurídicos, donde el autor ha encontrado, en el plano doméstico, ciertas rigideces que podrían impedir la implementación. 

Se busca demostrar que las nuevas modalidades, posibles desde el plano de nuevas herramientas tecnológicas disponibles, permiten desarrollar modelos altamente beneficiosos en las relaciones: empresa, trabajador, familia y sociedad.

Recorre los paradigmas y mitos que se esconden detrás de nuestra cultura empresaria, y se analizará la manera en que estos limitan la aplicación de los nuevos modelos de trabajo en todo su potencial.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Master of Social Work
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: August 13, 2023, Mariana worked with Mariana on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
Tuve el placer de trabajar con Mariana Hartstein en Badino Turismo en Buenoa Aires, donde fórmabamos parte del equipo de ventas.
Mariana siempre demostró ser eficiente y responsable de sus tareas. Ademas, sus cualidades personales, el trato con el cliente y otros miembros de la empresa, hicieron que su incorporación fuera my valiosa para el departamento de ventas.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Bilingual Math & Language Arts Teacher (English/Spanish)
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 28, 2023, Julio León was senior to Mariana but didn't manage Mariana directly
receivedRecommendations.description: I had the pleasure to work with Mariana and seeing her excel in a role and work environment in which most people would struggle. She landed into a new role that consolidated two preexisting positions, reporting from Buenos Aires to her manager in Brazil. Her high degree of responsibility, efficiency and impressive learning skills were critical to her success. However, I believe that what set her apart from her peers and helped her thrive during the unsettling times of the UA/CO merger were her people skills, her capacity to work with and for the greater good of the team.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Licenciada en Turismo. Consultoria y asesoramiento. Profesor Universitario
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 5, 2023, Silvia managed Mariana directly
receivedRecommendations.description: Tuve el placer de trabajar con Mariana hace unos años atrás. Además de ser una buena persona persona, es una excelente profesional, dedicada a la atención muy esmerada de sus clientes. Siempre muy detallista y respetuosa. Se destacaba por sus buenos modales y vocabulario, además de saber trabajar en equipo junto a otros colaboradores. 100% recomendable como recurso humano!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: SME Account Manager en United Airlines
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 4, 2023, Betina worked with Mariana but on different teams
receivedRecommendations.description: Mariana es una excelente profesional, responsable, creativa y muy talentosa. Tuve el placer de trabajar con Mariana y he aprendido muchísimo de ella. Es colaboradora, le gusta trabajar en equipo y sobre todo, es una excelente persona.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Graduate in Geography - Surveyor - BIM Modeler - Specialist in Geographic Information Systems (GIS)
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: March 28, 2024, Mariano worked with Nazarena but on different teams
receivedRecommendations.description:
Nazarena es una profesional excepcional con una dedicación inquebrantable a su trabajo. Su responsabilidad y compromiso son evidentes en cada tarea que emprende. Además, Nazarena demuestra una notable adaptación a los cambios, lo que la convierte en una valiosa colaboradora en cualquier entorno laboral.
En resumen, recomiendo a Nazarena por su profesionalismo, capacidad de adaptación y excelente desempeño en su trabajo. Fue un placer trabajar con ella y estoy seguro de que seguirá teniendo un impacto positivo en su carrera profesional. 🌟

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Jefe de Ventas at Gili y cia.
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: April 7, 2021, Pablo M worked with Nazarena but on different teams
receivedRecommendations.description: Excelente profesional y mejor persona. Siempre con mucha entrega y buena predisposición, cuenta con la humildad y ganas necesarias para siempre aprender y mejorar sus capacidades y aptitudes.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Gerente Eurotaller y Top Truck para Argentina, Chile, Perú, Bolivia, Paraguay y Uruguay
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: August 14, 2020, Rodrigo managed Nazarena directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
Nazarena ha sido un colaborador ideal. 
Entre sus muchas virtudes destaco la pasión con la que afronta la vida en general y el trabajo en particular. Una vez que se consigue que Nazarena se apasione con la tarea, el resto fluye solo. Se compromete e identifica con los proyectos de una manera única, liderándolos de principio a fin.
Lidera muy bien sus grupos de trabajo donde su empatía resalta sobre todo. Siempre sabe "ponerse en los zapatos del otro" y desde alli, trabajar e influenciar para que los objetivos se cumplan.
Cálida, comprometida, cordial, empática, apasionada, con una gran dosis de creatividad y con una clara tendencia a trabajar por objetivos quien tenga la posibilidad de contarla en su equipo de trabajo no debería dudarlo un segundo.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Supervisor de Mantenimiento Eléctrico, Instrumentación y Válvulas
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: August 10, 2020, Juan Pablo worked with Nazarena but on different teams
receivedRecommendations.description: Excelente profesional y mejor aun compañera !! Siempre predispuesta a dar el 110%

headline: Product Manager
about: Bilingual Professional with solid experience in processes development within multinational and multicultural environments. Deep knowledge in the management and implementation of projects of medium and high complexity according to the management and quality processes developed by PMI®. Vast experience with budget management, continual improvement process, Lean Six Sigma and Agile methodologies. Deep technical knowledge with a thorough understating of the telecommunications industry including a wide range of IP, capacity and TI services. Team player with great attention to details, strong customer service focus, and excellent interpersonal, communication and presentation skills.

experience.description:
Telefonica Tech Project

- In charge of desktop virtualizations solutions (VDI Citrix, AVD, W365)
- Managing the lifecycle of the products and KPI’s definitions
- Defining Comercial Offers and Business Plans
- Lead the vision for the portfolio, strategy, and short, medium, and long-term roadmap

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
- Detours managment including identification, investigation, documentation, resolution and closure
- DDBB, Aplication & Integrations Server configuration
- Product validation
- MSQL Server & Oracle database managment

-Responsible for B2B Projects billing, ensuring the customer approval and the correct final documentation status for the project closure
-Leading a team that develops the step by step for the project implementation and keeps track of all projects detours, ensuring that a fast solution is developed and delivered in order to minimize impact in provision time and budget
-Consultant for processes and continuous improvement
-Leading a system migration in which all B2B provision is based

-Proactively developed a new information system that made the information regarding all projects status could be collected faster and effectively
-Developed several processes that successfully reduced provision times
-Worked side by side with product managers as a system consultant to implement new fulfillment processes
-Developed and delivered reports that help manage projects at a global level
-Developed and delivered executive presentations to different kind of audiences

-Main point of contact regarding circuit provisioning and implementation in Argentina as well as for off-net circuits in other countries.
-Implemented and managed several international projects in Europe, LATAM, and North America
-Very good understanding of service delivery inside Data Centers, including Telefonica Argentina’s DC as well as Telefonica International POPs in Barracas and Cuyo
-Proactively managed changes in project scope, identified and resolved issues and potential crises and devised contingency plans
-Developed and delivered progress reports, proposals, requirements documentation and presentations

experience.companyName: Municipalidad de Lomas de Zamora Pcia. de Bs. As.
experience.description:
-Designed and mantained the different Company networks
-Installed and configured equipment neccesary including routers, switches and radio links
-Troubleshooting

experience.companyName: Municipalidad de Lomas de Zamora Pcia. de Bs. As.
experience.description:
-Monitored system use
-Setted up user accounts
-Managed Back-up
-On Site support

skills.name: Dirección y desarrollo de equipos de trabajo

headline: Helping Water Cycle Companies achieve their digital transformation thanks to the Xylem Vue platform
about:
𝗔𝘆𝘂𝗱𝗼 𝗮 𝗼𝗿𝗴𝗮𝗻𝗶𝘇𝗮𝗰𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗲𝘀 𝘆 𝗲𝗺𝗽𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗮𝘀 𝗱𝗲𝗹 𝗰𝗶𝗰𝗹𝗼 𝗱𝗲𝗹 𝗮𝗴𝘂𝗮 𝗮 𝗮𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗮𝗿 𝘆 𝘀𝘂𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗿 𝘀𝘂𝘀 𝗿𝗲𝘁𝗼𝘀 𝗲𝗻 𝗴𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗼́𝗻, 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗰𝗶𝗼́𝗻 𝘆 𝗴𝗼𝗯𝗲𝗿𝗻𝗮𝗻𝘇𝗮 𝗵𝗶́𝗱𝗿𝗶𝗰𝗮 𝗺𝗲𝗱𝗶𝗮𝗻𝘁𝗲 𝗶𝗻𝗻𝗼𝘃𝗮𝗰𝗶𝗼́𝗻 𝘁𝗲𝗰𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼́𝗴𝗶𝗰𝗮 𝘆 𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝗰𝗶𝗼́𝗻 𝗱𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹, 𝗲𝗻𝗹𝗮𝘇𝗮𝗻𝗱𝗼 𝗹𝗮𝘀 𝗻𝗲𝗰𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗱𝗮𝗱𝗲𝘀 𝗱𝗲𝗹 𝗺𝗲𝗿𝗰𝗮𝗱𝗼 𝗰𝗼𝗻 𝗲𝗹 𝗱𝗲𝘀𝗮𝗿𝗿𝗼𝗹𝗹𝗼 𝗱𝗲 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁𝗼.

Me motiva desarrollar y emprender proyectos innovadores aportando mi habilidades de liderazgo, versatilidad y creatividad combinado con un enfoque estratégico y multisectorial.

𝗧𝗿𝗮𝘆𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗶𝗮: M.Sc. Ing. Civil e Ing. Caminos especializado en recursos hídricos y en consultoría internacional durante más de 20 años y con experiencia en desarrollo de negocio digital en el sector del agua. 

𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗶𝗮: Software inteligente para redes de abastecimiento y Transformación Digital, Gestión de Recursos Hídricos y Planificación de cuenca, Gestión de sequías e inundaciones, Hidráulica fluvial, Hidrología e Hidrometría, Redes de control y monitoreo hidrometeorológico, Proyectos I+D.

𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗲𝘀: Gerencia y dirección de equipos, emprendimiento en Start-ups, desarrollo de negocio y de producto, jefe de proyectos senior, capacitación y consultoría especializada.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España

experience.description:
M.Sc. Civil Engineer specialized in water resources, water engineering and international consultancy for over 20 years and with experience in digital business development in the water sector.

Topics: Smart Software (Digital Twin) for water supply networks, new technologies & Digital Transformation, Water Resources Management & Basin Planning, Drought and flood management, River hydraulics, hydrology and hydrometry, Hydrometeorological control and monitoring networks. Gauging Stations Design. R&D Projects.

WatEner is a technology based company founded by Grupo INCLAM and Eurecat Technology Centre offering a Smart Water Platform for improving daily operation and management of water networks in the water-energy nexus using Artificial Intelligence.
Job Functions: Elaborate Business Plan and define product & services development strategy, train the technical and sales team, business relations with customers & partners, etc.
Strategic consulting start-up in governance and optimisation of water resource management

experience.position: Head of Surface Hydrology (Water Resources Management Department)
experience.description: The Catalan Water Agency (Agència Catalana de l'Aigua, ACA) is the Catalan government's public company in charge of water planning and management in accordance with the basic principles of the European Water Framework Directive. The ACA promotes its own action plan to guarantee present and future water supply and water quality at source (groundwater and surface water).
Pre-doctoral Researcher in several topics related to river and torrential hydraulics linked to the Department of Hydraulic, Maritime and Environmental Engineering.

experience.position: Project Manager (Head of the Hydraulic & RDI Unit)
experience.description: Project Management and Drafting. Consultancy  and technical support in hydraulics, hydrology, water resources, hydrometry and fluvial morphodynamics. Team coordination.

experience.position: Tenured Adjunct Professor at Hydraulic Laboratory
experience.description: University teaching, research and specialized consultancy for the Hydraulic Laboratory.
Consultancy, Studies, Projects, Construction Management and Technical Assistance, focusing in the Water Sector.

experience.position: Graduate Teaching Assistant at Hydraulics Laboratory
experience.description: Coordinate, control and approve the practical classroom carried out by the students, under main Professor Direction. Develop the practical or theoretical classes. Collaborate in the task of exams evaluation, research and scientific studies.

experience.companyName: Water Supply Company of Carlos Paz (COOPI)
experience.description:
The Cooperativa Integral Regional de Provisión de Servicios Públicos, Vivienda y Consumo (COOPI) is the Water Supply, Sanitation, Gas and other Services Cooperative Company for the Villa Carlos Paz area in Córdoba. COOPI started in the 1950s and gives water to more tha 66.000 inhabitants.
Job Functions: Studies & Projects. Technical Assistance. Design of water supply networks based using hydraulic model Cybernet from Haestad Methods (today WaterCAD) for several areas of Carlos Paz and neighboring areas. Design of a bypass pipeline in the WTP of Cuesta Blanca. Assistance to other minor projects and studies, etc.

experience.companyName: DIPAS (Water & Sanitation Direction from Córdoba Government, Argentina)
experience.description:
Today DIPAS is APRHI (Administration for Water Resources from Córdoba Government).
Helping in the Cadastre Department & Checking Studies and Construction Drawing and Plans of domestic water supply and sanitation.

education.degree: Advanced Studies Diploma in Hydraulic Engineering
education.description: Research Field: Solid transport Influence in hydraulic calculations in high-slope channels under torrential conditions. Hyperconcentrated Flow and Sediment Transport at Steep Slopes.

education.fieldOfStudy: Canales y Puertos (MSc Civil Engineer in Spain)

education.degree: Master of Science (M.Sc.) in Engineering in Water Resources

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Planificación y gestión del agua / Ingeniera Agrónoma
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: April 26, 2021, Cinta reported directly to Jorge
receivedRecommendations.description:
He tenido el placer de trabajar con Jorge varios años en proyectos y consultorías relativas a la gestión de recursos hídricos, justo antes de que asumiera su rol de director de la start-up Watener.  Jorge es un gran profesional que reúne muchas virtudes, entre las que destacaría su sabiduría y conocimientos técnicos (especialmente en hidrometría) -que comparte y transmite al equipo de una manera muy didáctica-, su gran eficiencia y capacidad organizativa, así como su perfil altamente tecnológico. 
De Jorge me encanta su carácter amable y entretenido, así como su gran habilidad y sus múltiples recursos para resolver situaciones difíciles en los proyectos.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Responsable de prensa y redes sociales en Agencia Catalana del Agua (ACA). Doctor en Periodismo y Comunicación
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: November 29, 2012, Xavi worked with Jorge but on different teams
receivedRecommendations.description: Coincidí con Jorge en la Agència Catalana de l'Aigua durante la sequía vivida en 2007 y 2008 en Cataluña. Fue un momento muy difícil, debido a la necesidad de garantizar las demandas en un momento que los recursos hídricos escaseaban, ante una gran presión mediática, política y social. Jorge trabajó en ese momento con gran eficacia, profesionalidad y un elevado grado de perfección. Valoro también mucho la serenidad que tuvo en todo momento, facilitando el trabajo a sus compañeros. Además, consiguió hacer comprensibles muchos conceptos técnicos y, en algunos casos, también atendió algunos medios de comunicación que pedían aclaraciones sobre la sequía. Sin lugar a duda, una suerte poder trabajar con profesionales como Jorge y espero que algún día pueda volver a coincidir con él.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: INGENIERO CIVIL
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: June 9, 2010, Alberto and Jorge studied together
receivedRecommendations.description:
Jorge fue un estudiante brillante y responsable. Compartimos toda la carrera juntos y por supuesto interminables horas de estudio, demostrando constantemente su capacidad de aprendizaje y comprensión. 
Tiene una voluntad férrea y una conducta de estudio ejemplar.

headline: Head Chef
about:
Head Chef con más de 8 años de experiencia internacional en restaurantes de alta cocina en Australia, Nueva Zelanda, Argentina y España.
He desarrollado habilidades sólidas en planificación de menús, desarrollo de recetas, gestión de inventarios, relaciones con proveedores y liderazgo de equipos de cocina. Mi experiencia abarca desde la creación de platos innovadores y presentación de alta calidad, hasta la supervisión y entrenamiento del personal para asegurar altos estándares en seguridad alimentaria y servicio.

Algunos de mis roles previos incluyen Chef de Partie en Bennelong, un prestigioso restaurante en Sídney, donde supervisé el mantenimiento del área de trabajo, gestioné inventarios y colaboré directamente con el chef principal y sous-chef. En Fleur Restaurant en Perth, tuve un papel más estratégico, dirigiendo la planificación de menús, la gestión del equipo, y la relación con proveedores. También trabajé en The Archive at Mudbrick en Nueva Zelanda, asegurando la calidad del servicio y la implementación de protocolos de seguridad alimentaria.

Actualmente, como Head Chef en España, estoy enfocado en la evolución y modernización del menú de mi restaurante, integrando técnicas avanzadas de alta cocina y liderazgo eficiente en la gestión del equipo. Busco siempre ofrecer una experiencia gastronómica única.

Aptitudes:

Desarrollo de menús creativos: Innovación en recetas y presentación de platos.
Gestión de equipos de cocina: Entrenamiento y supervisión del personal.
Control de inventarios y costos: Gestión eficaz de insumos y reducción de desperdicios.
Relaciones con proveedores: Negociación y manejo eficiente de recursos.
Normas de seguridad alimentaria: Implementación y supervisión de altos estándares de seguridad e higiene.
Planificación de horarios y rendimiento del personal: Optimización de turnos y evaluación continua del desempeño.
Resolución de problemas en cocina: Adaptación rápida bajo presión para asegurar la calidad.
Experiencia en cocina internacional: Conocimiento y dominio de diversas técnicas culinarias globales.
topSkills: Gestión de inventarios • Gestión de personal • creacion de menu • Desarrollo de recetas • Control de Calidad y Saneamiento

headline: Ingeniera en Alimentos
about: Recibida en ingeniería en Alimentos en UADE. Experiencia demostrable en control de calidad trabajando dentro de la industria química.

experience.description:
En el área de control de calidad de fragancias y sabores, control de stock de insumos y reactivos, compras, aseguramiento de referencias según planes de trabajo.
Evaluación sensorial de perfumes, materias primas y sabores.
Análisis físico químicos de muestras de materia prima, sampling y producto terminado mediante determinación de acidez, peróxido, humedad, densidad e índice de refracción, meltingpoint, cromatografía gaseosa y PSA.
Verificación y calibración interna de equipos.
Auditorías internas de ISO 9001, ISO 45001 e ISO 14001

En el área de control de calidad de fragancias y sabores, control de stock de insumos y reactivos, compras, aseguramiento de referencias según planes de trabajo.
Análisis físico químicos de muestras de materia prima, sampling y producto terminado mediante determinación de acidez, peróxido, humedad, densidad e índice de refracción, meltingpoint, cromatografía, PSA y evaluaciones sensoriales.
Verificación y calibración interna de equipos.

En el área de entrenamiento brindando capacitaciones en BPM y manipulación de alimentos frescos a todo el personal propio de la compañía así como a los dueños de franquicias.
Realización de auditorías de seguimiento y medición de eficacia en las tiendas capacitadas. 
Redacción y actualización de manuales de capacitación y procedimientos.

Recepción y análisis de calidad a muestras de materias primas, sampling y producto terminado del área de fragancias mediante análisis físico químicos como determinaciones de acidez, peróxido, densidad e índice de refracción, flashpoint y colorimetría,   además de cromatografía gaseosa y evaluación sensorial. 
Carga de resultados en SAP, verificación y calibración de equipos, organización general del laboratorio e implementación de 5S.

education.degree: Master internacional en tecnología de los alimentos

certifications.title: Aprende data science: Cuenta historias con los datos
Toma de decisiones en situaciones de gran estrés

headline: AI Prompt & Automation Developer | Data Analyst | Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration
about:
Hello! My name is Sofia Heredia Fulginiti. I have a degree in Business Administration and Data Analysis, with experience in data analysis, visualization, and automation. I specialize in creating and optimizing AI prompts and developing workflow automation solutions using tools like Make, Power Automate.
I am passionate about transforming business challenges into actionable solutions through AI and automation, while leveraging data-driven insights to optimize processes and drive success.
topSkills: Python • SQL • Microsoft Power BI • R (Lenguaje de programación) • Tableau

experience.position: Data Analyst | AI Prompt & Automation Developer
experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
- Development of AI agents specialized in extracting, transforming, and structuring data in
JSON format, integrated into automated processes.
- Creation of advanced automation flows in Make, n8n, and Power Automate, connecting Gmail,
Outlook, WhatsApp, Trello, Excel, Google Sheets, and Google Drive.
- Design and optimization of customized AI prompts for specific use cases, increasing the
accuracy, consistency, and relevance of responses.
- Implementation of automatic functions: folder and record generation, filter application,
automatic responses, and real-time error detection/notification.
- Integration of AI and automation solutions into business processes, optimizing time and
eliminating repetitive manual tasks.
- Collaboration with clients in defining requirements and delivering customized technology solutions
that drive operational efficiency.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
- Developed the data analysis process to identify opportunities for improvement and optimize business profitability.
- Developed forecasts and predictive models, working with the Supply Chain team to optimize planning and reduce operational risks.
- I strategically managed distribution and logistics, ensuring efficiency in shipping and supply across different sales channels.
- Developed financial control assessments through detailed analysis of costs, consumption, and budgets, contributing to strategic decision-making.
- I regularly created data visualizations using tools such as Power BI, Google Sheets, Google Docs, and Excel, optimizing reports and analytical processes.

- I comprehensively managed two retail and wholesale disposable product branches, using data analysis to improve operational efficiency and maximize growth opportunities.
- I created monthly economic analysis reports in Excel to facilitate team decision-making.
- I developed segmentation analyses to adjust commercial strategy and increase the profitability of each branch.
- Recruited, selected, and trained customer service employees.
- Developed problem-solving skills, adapting to the environment and the customer.
- Negotiated with suppliers for the supply of inputs and performed periodic inventory control.

- Volunteering consisted of social outreach, providing tools and strategies to strengthen the entrepreneurial base and promote positive impact in the community.
- I provided training, accompaniment and advice to small local entrepreneurs for the development and growth of their businesses.

- Managed and cleaned the accounting firm's client database using Excel.
- Maintained records of accounts payable, accounts receivable and bank reconciliations, efficiently handling large volumes of data.
- I used tools such as Excel and Tango accounting software to manage data efficiently. 
- I collaborated in the preparation of tax returns and regulatory compliance.

education.description: Analysis of financial statistics, operations and supply chain management, investment projects

-Analytics and data metrics
-Business strategy 
-Content marketing
-Display advertising 
-E-commerce 
-E-commerce Email marketing 
-Local marketing
-SEM and SEO
-Social networks

-Optimize sales and marketing strategies for your product or service.
-Create effective titles, descriptions and photos for product listings and online ads.
-Creating business value in online sales.

headline: Analista en Banco Supervielle
about: Con el correr de los años, trabajando en un area operativa de soporte, pude descubrir la importancia y el rol fundamental que cumple la experiencia del cliente. Teniendo esta premisa es primordial que el trabajo diario sea basado en esto ya que de ello depende que el cliente nos recomiende, nos elija y nos vuelva a elegir.

headline: Product Designer at Cabify
about: Product Designer. Photographer. Teacher. Singer. Travel lover.

experience.description:
As a Sr. UX/UI designer I am in charge of the whole design process of the application: from the benchmark, information architecture, through wireframes and prototypes, to the design of the interface and definition of the new graphic system. I also take care of the illustrations, avatars and animations that are necessary for a better understanding of the interface.

I work daily with a team of frontend and backend developers. We organize with sprints through Jira. For my part I work with Sketch, Invision or Marvel, all Adobe package but mainly Illustrator, Photoshop and After Effects. I also use Zeplin to export the designs to a friendly interface so that developers can work with them.

Siendo Despegar una empresa con más de 3000 empleados,  tenemos como metodología de trabajo el modelo Kanban para priorizar y ordenar el trabajo entre Producto, IT y UX (utilizamos Jira para organizar las tareas). 
Trabajo como UX product designer en el team de Home y Searchbox (más conocida como la caja de búsqueda), y junto a mis colegas, UX research y UX content, realizamos weeklys con los equipos de Product Management y IT (Front y Backend) para analizar las tareas que venimos trabajando y las que nos depara el futuro. Somos User Centric (diseñamos en base a las necesidades de los usuarios) y Mobile First (teniendo en cuenta que la mayoría de las búsquedas son a través de los celulares). 

En UX nos basamos en Design Thinking como metodología que engloba todos los pasos del proceso de ideación. Al arrancar un proyecto nuevo, suelo comenzar con Benchmark externo (y también interno). Luego junto con encuestas realizadas a usuarios y análisis que me brinde Producto extraído de Google Analitycs, comienzo a realizar los primeros bocetos en baja. Estos primeros prototipos son puestos a prueba a través de test guerrilla con usuarios, para obtener el primer feedback de la manera más ágil posible. 
Luego avanzo con el diseño en alta: este prototipo de mayor fidelidad se evalúa con usuarios presenciales y junto con un compañero de Research nos encargamos de definir si las hipótesis que realizamos previamente se cumplen o no. Si el flujo esta listo para avanzar hacia la siguiente etapa, pasaría al equipo de IT, pero sino, se vuelve a comenzar, partiendo de iteraciones en el diseño que se probó. 

Metodología de diseño: Hace más de 3 años que en el equipo de diseño nos basamos en la metodología de Atomic Design donde ya no diseñamos páginas, sino un sistema de componentes.

Herramientas: Diseño interfaces en Sketch, luego las paso a Zeplin para uso de los desarrolladores. Marvel y Proto.io para prototipos. Illustrator y Photoshop para ilustraciones, íconos y ediciones.
