headline: Industrial T. Engineer - Project Manager - Specialist in Management / Negotiation
about:
Luego de una formación como Ingeniero T. Industrial y Project Manager he participado tanto en la planificación como en el desarrollo de diferentes proyectos. Particularmente vinculado al sector automovilístico, construcción (Obra Pública), packaging, consultoría, consumo masivo y, en la actualidad, ligado a la gestión de proyectos de climatización, tanto doméstica como industrial.

He trabajado como Project Manager Assistant, Area Manager, Responsable de Logística, de Compras , de Calidad, Jefe de Oficina Técnica, Coordinador de Obra, Gerente de Operaciones, Ingeniero de Logística y recientemente como Adjunto de Gerencia desarrollando aptitudes para la negociación, administración, liderazgo y dirección de equipos.

A lo largo de mi vida he vivido en diferentes países y estudiado diferentes lenguas como son Italiano, Francés e Ingles. He tenido la oportunidad de practicar dichas lenguas con nativos, independientemente de todo ello, lo que más rescato es la importancia en la comunicación, en el desarrollo laboral y personal, tanto en el ámbito privado como público.

Viendo en perspectiva el trabajo que he desarrollado en conjunto con mi vida personal, puedo decir que siempre he sido alguien que se supera, comprometido con lo que hago, y eso me ha llevado a querer seguir mirando para adelante, afrontando nuevos proyectos, optimizando los ya establecidos, mejorando mi entorno y a mi.
topSkills: Comunicación • Capacidad de análisis • Microsoft Office • Mejora continua

experience.location: Requena, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
Reportando directamente a los dueños de Grupo Codelca participo en la gerencia de las tres empresas que conforman el grupo, Componentes del Calor S.L., Vimai Now S.L., Ceramics Home Requena desarrollando las siguientes tareas:

- Soporte en el desarrollo de estrategias de negocio.
- Soporte organizacional a todos los niveles.
- Estudio de situación y propuestas para la mejora de la organización.
- Soporte a las diferentes áreas de la compañía para solidificar los procesos establecidos y mejorar y/o cambiar los necesarios.

Fundamentalmente mi rol se establece en el nexo entre la gerencia y las diferentes áreas de la compañía para poder fortalecer la organización en todas sus facetas.

experience.location: La Pobla de Vallbona, Valencia, Spain
experience.description:
Reporting to the Logistics Manager, I develop the following functions:

- Control of the supply plan, "Just in Time".
- Management of relationships with suppliers and internal customers.
- Analysis and monitoring of deliveries.
- Control, monitoring and solution of possible incidents at the logistics level.
- Analysis and improvement of internal logistics processes.
-.Implementation of operational strategies aimed at optimizing supply chain operations.
- Monitoring and analysis through management software (AS400/ALVIT/SAP).
- Application of Lean Manufacturing tools (5S, 8D, Kanban, etc.).

Providing the General Management and Board of Directors with the following functions:

- Work planning, provision of short and long-term services in all areas.
- Coordination of the different areas, Safety and Hygiene, Environment, Quality, Technical Office, Administration and Production.
- Negotiations and agreements with Banks, Financial Institutions, Leasing entities, Unions, Municipalities and Ministries.
- Technical and Economic Study of the project to be executed; proposing constructive alternatives, modifications or complements.
- Carry out the Technical Programming and Economic Planning of the works and provision of services.
- Solve the various technical problems that may arise during the execution of a specific work unit.
- Meetings with the construction team to establish priorities on the work to be carried out.
- Make a list of permanent materials and equipment and their corresponding quantities to make the purchase request.
- Request for prices and comparisons to subcontractors and suppliers.
- Manage technical queries with the Supervision and Client.
- Participation in the preparation of Quality Documents (Management Plan, General and Specific Procedures, Training Plans, etc.).
- Special participation in legal area; reception, classification and coordination of steps to follow with a specialized area.
- Coordination and support in the management of Preventive Competition
- Law 24.522 (LCQ) - Audits to suppliers and subcontractors.
- Site visits and progress control.
- Generation of work certificates both for the client and for Subcontractors.
- Works in progress: 
* Public bid N ° LP09 / 2019 "OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE OF THE SOUTHERN SANTIAGO DEL ESTERO AQUEDUCT" 
* Public bid N ° LP102 / 2010 "NATIONAL ROUTE No. 40 - SECTION PAREDITES - EL SOSNEADO"
* BIRF Loan 7992 - AR: "SOLANO VERA RAIN DRAIN - SAN LUIS - YERBA BUENA, TUCUMAN"

Reporting to the Technical, Administrative and General Management, I have developed the following functions:
- Short and long-term work planning in all areas.
- Coordination of the different areas, Safety and Hygiene, Environment, Quality, Technical Office, Administration and Production.
- Negotiations and agreements with the Guild and Municipalities.
- Technical and Economic Study of the project to be executed; proposing constructive alternatives, modifications or complements.
- Carry out the Technical Programming and Economic Planning of the work.
- Solve the various technical problems that may arise during the execution of a specific work unit.
- Meetings with the construction team to establish priorities on the work to be carried out.
- Make a list of permanent materials and equipment and their corresponding quantities to make the purchase request.
- Request for prices and comparisons to subcontractors and suppliers.
- Deliver construction plans to Production personnel.
- Manage technical queries with Supervision and / or Client
- Participation in the preparation of Quality Documents (Management Plan, General and Specific Procedures, Training Plans, etc.). - Audits to suppliers and subcontractors.
- Site visits and progress control.
- Generation of work certificates both for the client and for Subcontractors.
-Work in progress: Public tender No. LP08 / 2017 "Elevation of platforms, adaptation of infrastructure, and remodeling of stations on the General Belgrano Norte line"

Reporting to the Project Manager, he developed the following functions:

- Technical and Economic Study of the project to be executed; proposing constructive alternatives, modifications or complementary.
- Carry out the Technical Programming and Economic Planning of the work.
- Solve the different technical problems that may arise during the execution of a specific work unit.
- Meetings with the construction team to establish priorities on the work to be executed.
- Make a list of permanent materials and equipment and their corresponding amounts to make the purchase request.
- Request for prices and comparisons to subcontractors and suppliers.
- Deliver the plans for construction to the production staff
- Manage technical queries with Supervision and / or Client
- Verify the measurements of work performed for subsequent certification.
- Work in progress: Public tender No. LP08 / 2017 "Elevation of platforms, adaptation of infrastructure, and remodeling of stations in  - Línea General Belgrano Norte - "

In the Purchasing Department, I work in:

- Implementation and development of the Supply Strategy.
- Communication with suppliers.
- Negotiation with suppliers.
- Purchase Order Management (JDE).
- Internal / external customer satisfaction.
- Active participation in Inventory.
- Development of a systemic vision of the Packaging sector.
- Support to the manufacturer.
- Interdepartmental communication.
- Optimization of processes.
- Analysis and forecast of expenses. (Paretos-Ranking-Gaps).
- Negotiation of large-scale projects.
- Developing business indicators (KPI).

In the area of Management and Consultation for different companies, I have worked in:

- Manage publication of technical campaigns.
- Support to the network for queries of different types.
- Follow-up reports.
- Analysis of the current economic, mercantile and industrial panorama in order to design, modify and / or optimize different aspects of the automotive sector (DAFO -Brainstorming for new Projects).
- Coaching for different companies.

In the Network Development Department, I have worked in:

- Definition of Break Even analysis of the different After-Sales Workshop formats.
- Execution of the monitoring reports, through the analysis of the Business Indicators (KPI).
- Benchmarks.
- Development of cost reports taking into account all areas of the workshop; Tools and equipment, personnel, corporate identification, etc. In accordance with the regulations and standards of SEAT, S.A.
- Status Updates of the different Quick Service workshops that make up the SEAT Network.
- Operational evaluation of the standards of a new workshop concept that will offer a Fast Service.
- Implementation of 3D design of Fast Service workshops for different importers.
- After-sales service, to collaborate in the process of coordination of the development of the new concept of electronic strategy of the DMS (Dealer Management System).
- Development of Implementation Guide for a SEAT Fast Service.
- Support to the document management of the ISO audit.
- Participation in meetings with the different Area Manager of other countries (France, Itaia, Bosnia, Algeria, etc.), to analyze their impression and status of the different services that the aftermarket SEAT offers.

In the area of ​​Guarantee Management, I have worked in:

- Digitization of the Technical Service Manual - CAP2 - Guarantees (preparation of proposals, re-structuring of contents, etc.).
- Support in the elaboration and control of Surveys of Guarantees (mailing and writing).
- Development of Warranty News.
- Support in the verification and validation of the TOP Service People 2012 questionnaire.

In the area of Logistics, Management and Administration, I have worked in:

- Organization and Management of Personnel, contracting, administration of schedules.

education.description:
Objetivos:

Adquirir una sólida base de conocimientos y habilidades relacionadas con la Gestión de Proyectos en un corto período de tiempo.
Aprender a analizar los métodos, técnicas y herramientas para gestionar proyectos de una forma eficiente y satisfactoria.
Adquirir conocimientos esenciales sobre las metodologías agiles de gestión.
Lograr una visión completa, a la vez que práctica y flexible, de la profesión de Project Management, desde el contexto en el que realiza sus tareas hasta las habilidades que necesita desarrollar.
Aprender a trabajar en el campo de la gestión de proyectos, como directores, gerentes de oficina, consultores, gestores de proyectos, y cualquier otra función vinculada a cargos ejecutivos y de asesoría dentro del amplio campo de los mismos.

element.headline: Industrial T. Engineer - Project Manager - Specialist in Management / Negotiation
element.about:
Luego de una formación como Ingeniero T. Industrial y Project Manager he participado tanto en la planificación como en el desarrollo de diferentes proyectos. Particularmente vinculado al sector automovilístico, construcción (Obra Pública), packaging, consultoría, consumo masivo y, en la actualidad, ligado a la gestión de proyectos de climatización, tanto doméstica como industrial.

He trabajado como Project Manager Assistant, Area Manager, Responsable de Logística, de Compras , de Calidad, Jefe de Oficina Técnica, Coordinador de Obra, Gerente de Operaciones, Ingeniero de Logística y recientemente como Adjunto de Gerencia desarrollando aptitudes para la negociación, administración, liderazgo y dirección de equipos.

A lo largo de mi vida he vivido en diferentes países y estudiado diferentes lenguas como son Italiano, Francés e Ingles. He tenido la oportunidad de practicar dichas lenguas con nativos, independientemente de todo ello, lo que más rescato es la importancia en la comunicación, en el desarrollo laboral y personal, tanto en el ámbito privado como público.

Viendo en perspectiva el trabajo que he desarrollado en conjunto con mi vida personal, puedo decir que siempre he sido alguien que se supera, comprometido con lo que hago, y eso me ha llevado a querer seguir mirando para adelante, afrontando nuevos proyectos, optimizando los ya establecidos, mejorando mi entorno y a mi.
element.topSkills: Comunicación • Capacidad de análisis • Microsoft Office • Mejora continua

experience.location: Requena, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
Reportando directamente a los dueños de Grupo Codelca participo en la gerencia de las tres empresas que conforman el grupo, Componentes del Calor S.L., Vimai Now S.L., Ceramics Home Requena desarrollando las siguientes tareas:

- Soporte en el desarrollo de estrategias de negocio.
- Soporte organizacional a todos los niveles.
- Estudio de situación y propuestas para la mejora de la organización.
- Soporte a las diferentes áreas de la compañía para solidificar los procesos establecidos y mejorar y/o cambiar los necesarios.

Fundamentalmente mi rol se establece en el nexo entre la gerencia y las diferentes áreas de la compañía para poder fortalecer la organización en todas sus facetas.

experience.location: La Pobla de Vallbona, Valencia, Spain
experience.description:
Reporting to the Logistics Manager, I develop the following functions:

- Control of the supply plan, "Just in Time".
- Management of relationships with suppliers and internal customers.
- Analysis and monitoring of deliveries.
- Control, monitoring and solution of possible incidents at the logistics level.
- Analysis and improvement of internal logistics processes.
-.Implementation of operational strategies aimed at optimizing supply chain operations.
- Monitoring and analysis through management software (AS400/ALVIT/SAP).
- Application of Lean Manufacturing tools (5S, 8D, Kanban, etc.).

Providing the General Management and Board of Directors with the following functions:

- Work planning, provision of short and long-term services in all areas.
- Coordination of the different areas, Safety and Hygiene, Environment, Quality, Technical Office, Administration and Production.
- Negotiations and agreements with Banks, Financial Institutions, Leasing entities, Unions, Municipalities and Ministries.
- Technical and Economic Study of the project to be executed; proposing constructive alternatives, modifications or complements.
- Carry out the Technical Programming and Economic Planning of the works and provision of services.
- Solve the various technical problems that may arise during the execution of a specific work unit.
- Meetings with the construction team to establish priorities on the work to be carried out.
- Make a list of permanent materials and equipment and their corresponding quantities to make the purchase request.
- Request for prices and comparisons to subcontractors and suppliers.
- Manage technical queries with the Supervision and Client.
- Participation in the preparation of Quality Documents (Management Plan, General and Specific Procedures, Training Plans, etc.).
- Special participation in legal area; reception, classification and coordination of steps to follow with a specialized area.
- Coordination and support in the management of Preventive Competition
- Law 24.522 (LCQ) - Audits to suppliers and subcontractors.
- Site visits and progress control.
- Generation of work certificates both for the client and for Subcontractors.
- Works in progress: 
* Public bid N ° LP09 / 2019 "OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE OF THE SOUTHERN SANTIAGO DEL ESTERO AQUEDUCT" 
* Public bid N ° LP102 / 2010 "NATIONAL ROUTE No. 40 - SECTION PAREDITES - EL SOSNEADO"
* BIRF Loan 7992 - AR: "SOLANO VERA RAIN DRAIN - SAN LUIS - YERBA BUENA, TUCUMAN"

Reporting to the Technical, Administrative and General Management, I have developed the following functions:
- Short and long-term work planning in all areas.
- Coordination of the different areas, Safety and Hygiene, Environment, Quality, Technical Office, Administration and Production.
- Negotiations and agreements with the Guild and Municipalities.
- Technical and Economic Study of the project to be executed; proposing constructive alternatives, modifications or complements.
- Carry out the Technical Programming and Economic Planning of the work.
- Solve the various technical problems that may arise during the execution of a specific work unit.
- Meetings with the construction team to establish priorities on the work to be carried out.
- Make a list of permanent materials and equipment and their corresponding quantities to make the purchase request.
- Request for prices and comparisons to subcontractors and suppliers.
- Deliver construction plans to Production personnel.
- Manage technical queries with Supervision and / or Client
- Participation in the preparation of Quality Documents (Management Plan, General and Specific Procedures, Training Plans, etc.). - Audits to suppliers and subcontractors.
- Site visits and progress control.
- Generation of work certificates both for the client and for Subcontractors.
-Work in progress: Public tender No. LP08 / 2017 "Elevation of platforms, adaptation of infrastructure, and remodeling of stations on the General Belgrano Norte line"

Reporting to the Project Manager, he developed the following functions:

- Technical and Economic Study of the project to be executed; proposing constructive alternatives, modifications or complementary.
- Carry out the Technical Programming and Economic Planning of the work.
- Solve the different technical problems that may arise during the execution of a specific work unit.
- Meetings with the construction team to establish priorities on the work to be executed.
- Make a list of permanent materials and equipment and their corresponding amounts to make the purchase request.
- Request for prices and comparisons to subcontractors and suppliers.
- Deliver the plans for construction to the production staff
- Manage technical queries with Supervision and / or Client
- Verify the measurements of work performed for subsequent certification.
- Work in progress: Public tender No. LP08 / 2017 "Elevation of platforms, adaptation of infrastructure, and remodeling of stations in  - Línea General Belgrano Norte - "

In the Purchasing Department, I work in:

- Implementation and development of the Supply Strategy.
- Communication with suppliers.
- Negotiation with suppliers.
- Purchase Order Management (JDE).
- Internal / external customer satisfaction.
- Active participation in Inventory.
- Development of a systemic vision of the Packaging sector.
- Support to the manufacturer.
- Interdepartmental communication.
- Optimization of processes.
- Analysis and forecast of expenses. (Paretos-Ranking-Gaps).
- Negotiation of large-scale projects.
- Developing business indicators (KPI).

In the area of Management and Consultation for different companies, I have worked in:

- Manage publication of technical campaigns.
- Support to the network for queries of different types.
- Follow-up reports.
- Analysis of the current economic, mercantile and industrial panorama in order to design, modify and / or optimize different aspects of the automotive sector (DAFO -Brainstorming for new Projects).
- Coaching for different companies.

In the Network Development Department, I have worked in:

- Definition of Break Even analysis of the different After-Sales Workshop formats.
- Execution of the monitoring reports, through the analysis of the Business Indicators (KPI).
- Benchmarks.
- Development of cost reports taking into account all areas of the workshop; Tools and equipment, personnel, corporate identification, etc. In accordance with the regulations and standards of SEAT, S.A.
- Status Updates of the different Quick Service workshops that make up the SEAT Network.
- Operational evaluation of the standards of a new workshop concept that will offer a Fast Service.
- Implementation of 3D design of Fast Service workshops for different importers.
- After-sales service, to collaborate in the process of coordination of the development of the new concept of electronic strategy of the DMS (Dealer Management System).
- Development of Implementation Guide for a SEAT Fast Service.
- Support to the document management of the ISO audit.
- Participation in meetings with the different Area Manager of other countries (France, Itaia, Bosnia, Algeria, etc.), to analyze their impression and status of the different services that the aftermarket SEAT offers.

In the area of ​​Guarantee Management, I have worked in:

- Digitization of the Technical Service Manual - CAP2 - Guarantees (preparation of proposals, re-structuring of contents, etc.).
- Support in the elaboration and control of Surveys of Guarantees (mailing and writing).
- Development of Warranty News.
- Support in the verification and validation of the TOP Service People 2012 questionnaire.

In the area of Logistics, Management and Administration, I have worked in:

- Organization and Management of Personnel, contracting, administration of schedules.
- Organization and Management of Materials, ordering and distribution of materials between the different points of work.
- Logistic support and implementation of projects to meet delivery times.

headline: Intervención con personas migrantes y refugiadas. Solicitantes y beneficiarios de Protección Internacional. Cepaim. Valencia
about: He tenido la oportunidad de poder vivir en varios lugares del 🌏 desde donde tengo una visión más amplia y personal de lo que significa la movilidad humana, nací en Bogota Colombia, hice mi primaria en Madrid, España. Estuve dos años en Vancouver, Canadá, en donde estudié inglés conviví con personas de muchas nacionalidades y me empecé a interesar por diferentes culturas. En Bogota estudié sociología en la Universidad Santo Tomas. Viaje a Buenos Aires, Argentina donde estuve diez años hice la formación en Maestría de Políticas Internacionales convenio OIM. Tengo interés para gestionar, ejecutar e intervenir en proyectos de orden social que involucren personas en situación de vulnerabilidad y migrantes (experiencia en desplazamiento forzado a causa de la violencia interna Colombia).

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España

experience.position: Integradora social. Atencion Humanitaria. Emergencia Costas
experience.location: Miramar, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España

experience.position: Becaria. Programa de acogida. Proteccion Internacional.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España

experience.companyName: Asociación  Cultural de Mujeres Migrantes de San Telmo.
experience.description:
•Apoyar  el trabajo y la participación en el ámbito socio- cultural de  las mujeres  migrantes, la mayoría procedentes de Bolivia, Peru y Paraguay  radicadas en el barrio historico de San Telmo, Buenos Aires, Argentina. En este 
proceso se buscó promover y fomentar herramientas para posibilitar su actúar en el barrio y la ciudad  donde pudieran fortalecer su tejido social y su identidad dentro de la comunidad. Para esto se  llevaron  a cabo actividades, talleres y encuentros en igualdad, educación, cultura y Salud.

• Prestar servicios de apoyo para desarrollar los procesos relacionados con el trabajo comunitario, contemplados en el proyecto 131: “Asistencia a la niñez y apoyo a la familia para posibilitar el ejercicio de los derechos”. Trabajo con población Localidades Mártires y Puente Aranda.

experience.position: Investigadora  Área Cultura Democrática y Derechos Humanos
experience.description:
• Coordinar aspectos logísticos y académicos para la realización de los talleres teórico-prácticos “Juventud y ciudadanía: el cuento de la Democracia” Colegio Republica del Ecuador. Localidad de San Cristóbal. Agosto-Octubre 2005.                                                                                                                                                               • Gestionar la organización del Foro: “Juventud es mas que una palabra: cranea tus ideas”. Octubre 29 de 2005.
• Consolidar el  informe final sobre el rendimiento y el desarrollo de los talleres.

experience.companyName: Asociacion Red Mujeres Negras de Bogota (ASOGROMUNES)

education.degree: Experto en Intervenvion con personas Migrantes y Refugiadas
Formacion Maestria Politicas de Migraciones Internacionales

headline: Financial Advisor at Nationale Nederanden
about:
Licenciado en Administración graduado en la Universidad de Buenos Aires (UBA). En mi
trayectoria laboral cuento con más de diez años de experiencia en compañías multinacionales y basta experiencia en el sector contable/financiero. Dentro de mis
características personales me consideran una persona proactiva, metódica, con gran
capacidad de adaptación al cambio, orientada a resultados, y poseedor de habilidades de comunicación y
negociación.

experience.description: DXC Technology es una compañía americana, líder en consultoría y servicios tecnológicos. Asignado a un proyecto insite dentro de una importante entidad bancaria como Caixabank, mi misión como Service Manager es liderar el proceso scrum (Jira), coordinando el trabajo de diferentes áreas para lograr diferentes objetivos, además de optimizar, proponer y mejorar procesos bancarios. Dar seguimiento y cumplimiento de los SLA/KPI pactados con el cliente. Analizar diferentes indicadores relevantes del servicio con el objetivo de encontrar desviaciones y ejecutar planes de contingencia, asegurando la calidad para mantener al mínimo el porcentaje de error. Seguimiento presupuestario tanto de la facturación fija y variable. Desarrollo y ejecución de las formaciones internas, como así también el mantenimiento y actualización de los manuales. Preparación de informes varios tanto internos como para el cliente final. Gestión de equipos.

Nationale Nederlanden is an insurance company, part of ING Bank Group. As a
financial advisor my mission is find financials needs of my clients, analysing past, present and future situations, knowing their ages, heritage, personal and professional situation also the invesments could they have. I have to commercialize products based on saving & investment,
risk and mortgages. Other responsabilities I have are customer adquisition, advice, follow up and resolution of incidents. My goal is help our customers protect their financial future and everything that matters to them

Responsible for managing 150 accounts in the portfolio, insuring quality to our
clients. Analysis, management & conciliation of current accounts. Risk analysis of
new clients. Implementation and follow up of actions in overdue clients.
Renegotiation ofdebt of clients. Resolution of problems in clients, internal or external. Reporting management (Aging, DSO, Bad Debt, Monthly Budget). Integral management of collections. Data Entry. Upgradeand update of database. Participation, analysis and improvement upgrading system from functional business. Creating Documentation. Functional Testing Role .Creating Master Data
ERP: Axapta, Module: FI/CO

Responsible for managing over 60 Intercompany Accounts. Analysis of currents accounts clients & suppliers. Integral management of collections and payments. Resolution of problems in clients or suppliers. Conciliation of Intercompany accounts. Reporting management. Data Entry. Upgrade of database. Participation, analysis and improvement upgrading system from functional business. Creating
Documentation..Functional Testing Role .Creating Master Data
ERP SAP ECC Modulo FI/CO Módulos AP, AR

Responsible for managing over 100 accounts between customers & sponsors, insuring quality to our partners.Billing, analysis, management & conciliation of current accounts of customers and sponsors. Risk analysis and update of new clients to system. Updating purchase orders in system. Data Entry. Reporting management. Preparation of information to external auditors. 
ERP: Tango System, Module: Billing & Accounting.

Analysis, management and reclassification of journal entries and accounting accounts. Accounting of expenses, bank taxes and collections.  Bank reconciliations. Preparing Cash Flow and Cash Position
Analysis of stock, expenses of each sector and Balance Sheet. Support in internal and external audits.
External Reports (Interco - Cross Charges).

Responsible for managing over 250 suppliers accounts. Run weekly payments and controls expenses by receiving, processing, verifying, and reconciling invoices. Uploading payments to Banks platforms and preparing checks. Charges expenses to accounts and cost centers by analyzing invoice/expense reports; recording entries. Monitoring and resolving purchase order, contract, invoice, or payment discrepancies and documentation. Vendor attention and solving issues. Paying employees by receiving and verifying expense reports and requests for advances. Verifying and posting account transactions.
Verifying vendor accounts by reconciling monthly statements and related transactions.
filing documents. 
ERP: ISCALA, Module: Accounting

Data Entry. Bank reconciliation. Analisys, register and reclassification of accounting entries. Billing of current accounts and follow up collection. Recording invoices to the system and payment. Suppliers attention. Controling of expenses and payment. File maitenance and organization.
ERP: BTB. Module: Accounting

headline: Communication & Marketing Specialist | Brand Strategy | Content Creation | Community Growth | Available for Full-Time Roles
about:
Over 20 years of experience in digital marketing and brand communication.
I help businesses grow their presence and drive sales through personalized strategies.

Specialized in:

Brand communication

Content creation

Social media & community building

Google Ads & online campaign management

CRM & email strategy

Integrating AI tools for content & data optimization

I work closely with each client —visiting their businesses, understanding their values, and translating that into compelling messages.
My approach is human, flexible, and results-oriented.

I’ve worked hand-in-hand with small and medium-sized businesses, understanding their vision and turning it into actionable campaigns.
My approach is personal and on-site: I visit clients, understand their needs, and create content that reflects their values and identity.

What makes me different?

I don’t automate.

I don’t guess.

I communicate directly with clients.

I apply the latest tools in content, design, and analytics.

I focus on business goals and measurable impact.

Originally from Buenos Aires, Argentina.
Now based in Valencia, Spain.
Bachelor's in Communication (UBA – Public Opinion & Advertising).

Open to full-time opportunities in marketing, brand communication, or content strategy.
Let’s connect.
topSkills: Social Media Marketing • Multilingual Communication • Liderazgo de Proyectos • Comunicación Estratégica • Producción Multimedia

experience.description:
I provide brand communication and digital marketing services for small and medium-sized businesses in Valencia.

My work focuses on building authentic communities, increasing product and service sales, and aligning business identity with marketing strategy.

Key responsibilities:
– Brand messaging & positioning
– Content creation and social media strategy
– Community growth and client engagement
– Google Ads campaign management
– CRM and email marketing
– Integrating AI tools to enhance content, planning, and personalization

I work directly with each client, often on-site, to understand their values, goals, and challenges. This close collaboration allows me to create tailored strategies that connect emotionally and drive real results.

Led a 45-person team across sales, media, and IT departments.
Drove integration and collaboration between internal teams
Organized major global events in the digital marketing space.
Delivered consistent results under high-pressure environments.
Achieved market leadership position in LATAM within one year.

Led strategic sales planning and execution, driving growth in client acquisition and revenue.
Optimized digital traffic with advanced techniques to increase visibility, clicks, and campaign efficiency.
Built and managed key client relationships, boosting retention and market trust.
Directed a sales and marketing team, fostering collaboration and improving performance.
Used data analysis to support decisions on targeting, segmentation, and resource allocation.

experience.position: Sales Manager Row (rest of the world)
experience.companyName: .Fox Networks- Fox International Channels- News Corporation Group
experience.description:
Global sales leadership with a team of 4 people.
Planning and execution of strategies for market penetration in diverse markets.
Client relationship management enhancing customer loyalty and retention, as well as investment.
Optimization and performance managed through platforms to exceed revenue targets.
Attendance at major digital industry events.

experience.companyName: .Fox Italy- An online business unit of Fox International Channels
experience.description:
Led the market launch of .Fox in Italy, establishing operations in Rome and Milan.
Drove digital campaign rollouts via .Fox's predictive adtech platforms.
Managed end-to-end campaign execution, including market research and client acquisition.
Oversaw billing and secured media inventory for local and international clients.
Operated solo for the first 8 months, laying the foundation for future team expansion.

CLed end-to-end online marketing campaigns, from planning to post-campaign analysis.
Used data and budget insights to improve performance and maximize ROI.
Acquired new clients and optimized campaigns for existing accounts.
Opened markets in Venezuela and Colombia through international business trips.
Represented the company at Ad Tech Miami, building key industry relationships.

I began my career as an assistant, primarily responsible for preparing campaign reports. After just a month in this role, I quickly transitioned to more proactive responsibilities, including developing proposals and directly engaging with clients. Remarkably, in my first month of undertaking these new tasks, I successfully closed my first 20 online campaigns, a milestone that ignited my passion for this field and set the stage for my future in this dynamic industry.

experience.position: Bilingual Customer Service Representative | Teleperformance for Dell Computers
experience.description:
Delivered customer service in English for U.S.-based Dell clients.
Managed inquiries, complaints, and product issues with a solution-oriented approach.
Recognized twice for outstanding customer feedback.
Strengthened client satisfaction and contributed to Dell’s positive brand perception.

element.headline: Communication & Marketing Specialist | Brand Strategy | Content Creation | Community Growth | Available for Full-Time Roles
element.about:
Over 20 years of experience in digital marketing and brand communication.
I help businesses grow their presence and drive sales through personalized strategies.

Specialized in:

Brand communication

Content creation

Social media & community building

Google Ads & online campaign management

CRM & email strategy

Integrating AI tools for content & data optimization

I work closely with each client —visiting their businesses, understanding their values, and translating that into compelling messages.
My approach is human, flexible, and results-oriented.

I’ve worked hand-in-hand with small and medium-sized businesses, understanding their vision and turning it into actionable campaigns.
My approach is personal and on-site: I visit clients, understand their needs, and create content that reflects their values and identity.

What makes me different?

I don’t automate.

I don’t guess.

I communicate directly with clients.

I apply the latest tools in content, design, and analytics.

I focus on business goals and measurable impact.

Originally from Buenos Aires, Argentina.
Now based in Valencia, Spain.
Bachelor's in Communication (UBA – Public Opinion & Advertising).

Open to full-time opportunities in marketing, brand communication, or content strategy.
Let’s connect.
element.topSkills: Social Media Marketing • Multilingual Communication • Liderazgo de Proyectos • Comunicación Estratégica • Producción Multimedia

experience.description:
I provide brand communication and digital marketing services for small and medium-sized businesses in Valencia.

My work focuses on building authentic communities, increasing product and service sales, and aligning business identity with marketing strategy.

Key responsibilities:
– Brand messaging & positioning
– Content creation and social media strategy
– Community growth and client engagement
– Google Ads campaign management
– CRM and email marketing
– Integrating AI tools to enhance content, planning, and personalization

I work directly with each client, often on-site, to understand their values, goals, and challenges. This close collaboration allows me to create tailored strategies that connect emotionally and drive real results.

Led a 45-person team across sales, media, and IT departments.
Drove integration and collaboration between internal teams
Organized major global events in the digital marketing space.
Delivered consistent results under high-pressure environments.
Achieved market leadership position in LATAM within one year.

Led strategic sales planning and execution, driving growth in client acquisition and revenue.
Optimized digital traffic with advanced techniques to increase visibility, clicks, and campaign efficiency.
Built and managed key client relationships, boosting retention and market trust.
Directed a sales and marketing team, fostering collaboration and improving performance.
Used data analysis to support decisions on targeting, segmentation, and resource allocation.

experience.position: Sales Manager Row (rest of the world)
experience.companyName: .Fox Networks- Fox International Channels- News Corporation Group
experience.description:
Global sales leadership with a team of 4 people.
Planning and execution of strategies for market penetration in diverse markets.
Client relationship management enhancing customer loyalty and retention, as well as investment.
Optimization and performance managed through platforms to exceed revenue targets.
Attendance at major digital industry events.

experience.companyName: .Fox Italy- An online business unit of Fox International Channels
experience.description:
Led the market launch of .Fox in Italy, establishing operations in Rome and Milan.
Drove digital campaign rollouts via .Fox's predictive adtech platforms.
Managed end-to-end campaign execution, including market research and client acquisition.
Oversaw billing and secured media inventory for local and international clients.
Operated solo for the first 8 months, laying the foundation for future team expansion.

CLed end-to-end online marketing campaigns, from planning to post-campaign analysis.
Used data and budget insights to improve performance and maximize ROI.
Acquired new clients and optimized campaigns for existing accounts.
Opened markets in Venezuela and Colombia through international business trips.
Represented the company at Ad Tech Miami, building key industry relationships.

I began my career as an assistant, primarily responsible for preparing campaign reports. After just a month in this role, I quickly transitioned to more proactive responsibilities, including developing proposals and directly engaging with clients. Remarkably, in my first month of undertaking these new tasks, I successfully closed my first 20 online campaigns, a milestone that ignited my passion for this field and set the stage for my future in this dynamic industry.

Delivered customer service in English for U.S.-based Dell clients.
Managed inquiries, complaints, and product issues with a solution-oriented approach.
Recognized twice for outstanding customer feedback.
Strengthened client satisfaction and contributed to Dell’s positive brand perception.

headline: Unity Game Developer
about:
Tengo mas de 5 años de experiencia en la industria de los videojuegos con un juego publicado en Steam y otro en proceso de desarrollo con fecha de salida en 2022.

A continuación adjunto mi CV con un link a mi porfolio (En Español):
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SI072iSPcM1RHKLddY701SnbCINc8xRQEmBU5a4DPYc

I attach below my CV that contains a link to my portfolio (English):
https://docs.google.com/document/d/161qP51xlKapwk9EEfAj3dc2lSqs5Hy3JXtEJEdd5dm4

experience.description:
Aconcagua es una software factory que trabaja con distintos clientes en todo el mundo. Actualmente trabajo en el desarrollo de un un juego de cartas de la franquicia Magic: The Gathering que saldrá para Android, iOS y Steam.
Principales tecnologías utilizadas: Unity, C#, Perforce, Docker.
Producto desarrollado: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.wizards.blitz&gl=NO

Quark Academy es una empresa dedicada a brindarle una entrega continua de profesional calificado a empresas tecnológicas mediante capacitaciones.
Como creador de contenido de Unity 3D mi responsabilidad es crear el temario de los cursos y luego desarrollar cada unidad, tanto a nivel teórico como practico y ejercitación, para que los desarrolladores que hacen la capacitación aprendan lo mejor posible cada tema.
También brindo consultoría personalizada para despejar dudas puntuales.

Ivisa (Impresora Internacional de valores) se dedica al desarrollo de maquinas para agencias de lotería y quiniela. Como programador de la empresa realice el desarrollo tanto front-end como back-end de nuevos requisitos y el mantenimiento del sistema. Esto principalmente mediante el desarrollo de API REST y Windows Forms.
Principales tecnologías utilizadas: C# y SQL Server.

Bacus Studios es una empresa dedicada al desarrollo de videojuegos. Como programador principal de la empresa realice programación avanzada en temas de gráficos, física, mecánicas, rendimiento y networking. Como Lead Programer también tome decisiones con respecto a tecnologías a utilizar y cuestiones de diseño y arquitectura del software. El juego desarrollado fue Tridents Wake, un Twin Stick Shooter que se puede jugar cooperativo hasta con 4 personas tanto de manera online como local  con mapas generados proceduralmente.
Principales tecnologías utilizadas: Unity, C#, Git, Steamworks.
Producto desarrollado: https://store.steampowered.com/app/704880/Tridents_Wake/

education.description: Fui primer promedio de la carrera de Licenciatura en sistemas y computación en el año 2015.

headline: Ingeniería y consultoría en gases renovables.
about:
Máster en Gestión de proyectos con orientación en Energías Renovables y Eficiencia Energética.  Investigación y desarrollo en captación y valorización energética de biogás de vertedero en Argentina

Actualmente, trabajando como ingeniera de proyectos de gas renovable en Biovic Consulting.

Ingeniera con 7 años de experiencia en la industria, desempeñando tareas en control operativo de procesos, planificación de la producción de refinerías y diseño de plantas de biometano.

Comprometida con los objetivos de desarrollo sostenible de Naciones Unidas y con especial interés en proyectos de economía circular y energías renovables.

experience.position: Ingeniera de proyectos de biogás y biometano

experience.description:
- Diseño técnico de plantas de biogás y biometano.
- Gestión y coordinación de proyectos, trato directo con el cliente.
- Elaboración de anteproyectos y estudios de viabilidad técnica.
- Elaboración de informes técnicos y memorias para distintos niveles de detalle que se requieren en proyectos constructivos. 
- Elaboración de balances de masa y energía de instalaciones de biometano.
- Apoyo en la tramitación de permisos, autorizaciones y licencias de proyecto.
-Interlocución con proveedores

Coordination Waste2energy StartUp Europe Accelerathon.
Coordination Rice Straw StartUp Europe Accelerathon. 
Drafting Projects proposal for LIFE Enviroment sub-programme call, EIC Accelerator, Innovation Fund, Green Deal
Coordination European project CDClean EIT Urban Mobility

-Development and monitoring of documentation referred to the "Covenant of mayors for Climate and Energy". 
-Technical visits to municipal buildings for evaluation of energy facilities.

experience.position: OPERATIONAL CONTROL ENGINEER . Operational  Planning and Supply Downstream management.
experience.description:
Main responsibilities 
-Improving the operational planning model in Aspen MPIMS tool.
-Providing technical knowledge to enable implementation of identified opportunities in refinery planning process.
- Production plans controlling, detecting deviations and proposing improvements. 
-Evaluating and approval of technical specifications of fuels and petrochemical products. 
-Fuel quality reports. 
-Refineries operational variables analysis.

Job  Achievements:
-Plants Test Run incorporation to the Aspen PIMS planning model. 
-Monthly reports industrial plants operation analysis.

experience.position: MANAGEMENT CONTROL ANALYST. Downstream Refining Management.
experience.description:
Main responsibilities: 
-Operating expenses of refineries analysis.
-Budget scenarios impact analysis solicited by the management. 
-Data load in SAP for refining budget preparation. 

Job Achievements: 
-Refining Margins calculation

experience.position: Pasante en Planificación operativa y abastecimiento de Downstream
experience.description:
Tareas realizadas:
-Elaboración de tablero de control de la gerencia.
-Análisis de consumos energéticos de las principales plantas de la refinería.
-Elaboración de reportes con la herramienta Report Writter de Aspen MPIMS.

education.description: Final project: “Conceptual, Basic and detailed engineering of Natural Gas treatment plant" with its Environmental Impact Study.

education.schoolName: Instituto “Nuestra Señora de Luján Hermanos Maristas

projects.title: Final project: “Conceptual, Basic and detailed engineering of Natural Gas treatment plant" with its Environmental Impact Study.
CDClean -  EIT Urban Mobility
projects.description:
CDClean New Disinfection Formulation, ofrece una alternativa disruptiva de desinfección de los espacios públicos a gran escala. El objetivo principal del proyecto consiste en la obtención de un biocida con efecto antiséptico prolongado y con fijación permanente a las superficies.

Este proyecto fue llevado a cabo por DITECPESA S.A en un proceso de innovación abierta junto con las Startups Nanoinnova y Bioassays desde abril-2020, hasta diciembre del mismo año. La fase inicial recibió financiación por parte del Instituto Europeo de Innovación y Tecnología, dentro de la convocatoria EIT- Urban Mobility contra la COVID-19. La nueva solución aportará gran capacidad de desinfección a la vez de un tiempo de actividad residual sobre superficiesmuy elevado, resolviendo así el problema de los actuales productos, con tiempo de actividad muy reducido y efectos de desinfección instantáneos.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Senior Process Engineer at Everllence / Alternative fuels / Shipping decarbonization

She has earned everyone´s trust because she is loyal, clever and an excellent problem solver. She has always been interested in providing sustainable and innovative solutions.
I have shared many years of the Chemical Engineer career with Juliana and we have also worked in the same company group, where we have attended technical courses together and I have seen how fast she has grown professionally. Juliana always stands out from every group, she is smart, practical an eager to learn and overcome herself.

projects.title: Final project: “Conceptual, Basic and detailed engineering of Natural Gas treatment plant" with its Environmental Impact Study.
CDClean -  EIT Urban Mobility
projects.description:
CDClean New Disinfection Formulation, ofrece una alternativa disruptiva de desinfección de los espacios públicos a gran escala. El objetivo principal del proyecto consiste en la obtención de un biocida con efecto antiséptico prolongado y con fijación permanente a las superficies.

Este proyecto fue llevado a cabo por DITECPESA S.A en un proceso de innovación abierta junto con las Startups Nanoinnova y Bioassays desde abril-2020, hasta diciembre del mismo año. La fase inicial recibió financiación por parte del Instituto Europeo de Innovación y Tecnología, dentro de la convocatoria EIT- Urban Mobility contra la COVID-19. La nueva solución aportará gran capacidad de desinfección a la vez de un tiempo de actividad residual sobre superficiesmuy elevado, resolviendo así el problema de los actuales productos, con tiempo de actividad muy reducido y efectos de desinfección instantáneos.

publications.title: Electrificación de la última milla del corredor seco mesoamericano
publications.publishedAt: ENERLAC. Revista de energía de Latinoamérica y el Caribe · Jun 12, 2021
publications.description: El artículo presenta una estrategia para resolver el trilema alimentación, agua y energía según los ODS. La estrategia fomenta las Comunidades Rurales Bajas en Carbono, comunidades sin acceso a la red de energía, situación habitual en el corredor seco mesoamericano. La estrategia va encaminada a la electrificación de la última milla, para ello se propone: (i) aumentar el acceso al agua y a la energía de forma local, (ii) mejorar la eficiencia energética en todas las etapas de la cadena de suministro; (iii) utilizar exclusivamente energías renovables endógenas; (iv) manejo sostenible de recursos forestales; y (v) garantizar la seguridad alimentaria. La estrategia se aplica a la comunidad de El Santuario en Honduras. Se propone un proyecto de gestión de agua, producción de alimentos y biocombustibles, y una red híbrida de energías renovables. Hemos estudiado la viabilidad y el impacto de replicar esta solución a las comunidades rurales del corredor seco mesoamericano. Los impactos de escalar esta metodología contribuirían significativamente a que se cumplan los ODS.

publications.title:
Modelling biomass gasifiers in hybrid renewable energy microgrids; a
complete procedure for enabling gasifiers simulation in HOMER
publications.publishedAt: Renewable Energy · Apr 28, 2021
publications.description: Off grid electrification is key to achieving universal electricity access. Despite the potential of biomass gasifiers as a clean technology to ensure reliable systems, they are not as well looked upon as their advantages suggest. In particular, the software HOMER, which researchers and technicians use the most to simulate and design Microgrids, does not include biomass gasification among its simulation technologies. Although some authors did simulate biomass gasifiers in HOMER, the necessary parameters and procedures to calculate and include them in the tool remain unclear, non-replicable, and leave open research questions as regards modelling. Using the inbuilt Biogas power plant modules in HOMER, this paper presents a set of steps to include the technical and economic parameters to simulate fuelling an electric generator through the syngas produced in a downdraft biomass gasification plant. Two case studies of isolated rural communities in Honduras and Zambia show the viability of the procedure. These case studies also confirm the technical and economic viability of islanded biomass-photovoltaic hybrid renewable energy microgrids. In both cases, the energy demand supplied and distributed by the microgrid had a Levelized Cost of Energy lower than the alternative of extending the electric grid to the communities.

publications.title: Aumentando la resiliencia y mitigando el cambio climático para el desarrollo rural: una experiencia en Honduras
publications.publishedAt: Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) of the United Nations · Apr 23, 2021
publications.description:
La Estrategia sobre el Cambio Climático de la Organización de las Naciones Unidas para la Alimentación y la Agricultura (FAO) reconoce que las acciones sobre el cambio climático son clave para erradicar el hambre, la inseguridad al¬imentaria y la desnutrición. Con el fin de alcanzar los Objetivos de Desarrollo Sostenible (ODS) de la Agenda 2030 y los Objetivos Estratégicos de la FAO (OE), se ha desarrollado el concepto innovador de agricultura baja en carbono, y se ha creado el concepto de Comunidades Rurales Bajas en Carbono, para promover la seguridad alimentaria y mejorar la resiliencia climática, el bienestar y los medios de vida de los pequeños agricultores en las comunidades rurales, a través de acciones que permitan la adaptación y mitigación al cambio climático.

La promoción de un enfoque de desarrollo bajo en carbono en las co¬munidades rurales incluye proporcionar acceso a energías renovables, además de mejorar las prácticas de producción agrícola a través de la implementación de agroforestería y la gestión sostenible de los recur¬sos naturales. Estas acciones permiten la cuantificación y certificación de las emisiones de GEI reducidas o evitadas, lo que permitirá dar un primer paso hacia el acceso a los mercados de carbono y nuevas fuen¬tes de ingresos.
La primera experiencia práctica del concepto de Comunidades Rurales Bajas en Carbono se llevó a cabo en una comunidad rural de Honduras. Los resultados, impactos y logros de esta experiencia proporcionaron datos que servirán de base para su replicación en comunidades rurales alrededor del mundo.

publications.title: Modelling a gasifier with HOMER for the simulation of off-grid hybrid renewable energy microgrids
publications.publishedAt: 15th Conference on Sustainable Development of Energy, Water and Environment Systems · Jan 1, 2020

headline: Business & Data Analyst - Revenue Operations en Sesame HR
about:
I am a Bachelor of Business Administration from the University of Buenos Aires, with experience in planning and strategy, financial and business analysis, and commercial management. My most recent position was as Commercial Manager at La Fondiatta, a gastronomy and catering company, where I led the development and execution of commercial plans, budgets, and sales projections.

Previously, I worked as a Senior Planning and Strategy Analyst at Mercado Libre, the leading e-commerce company in Latin America, where I provided financial and strategic support to the retail commercial team in Chile. In this role, I used tools such as SQL, Tableau, Looker, and Data Suite to analyze and present business results, profitability of new opportunities, and control retail business health. I also contributed to improving forecasting processes and inventory and sales management. 

Before that, I was a Planning Analyst at Prisma Medios de Pago, where I developed and analyzed performance indicators for the Operations area. 

And my previous experience was in Accenture, where I worked as Client Fianancial Management Analyst, where I delivered financial support to the commercial team in Brazil, ensuring to maximize the profitability of various contracts.

My professional goal is to continue growing and learning in the field of business planning, and commercial analysis, bringing value to the organizations I work with, and collaborating with multidisciplinary and dynamic teams.

element.headline: Business & Data Analyst - Revenue Operations en Sesame HR
element.about:
I am a Bachelor of Business Administration from the University of Buenos Aires, with experience in planning and strategy, financial and business analysis, and commercial management. My most recent position was as Commercial Manager at La Fondiatta, a gastronomy and catering company, where I led the development and execution of commercial plans, budgets, and sales projections.

Previously, I worked as a Senior Planning and Strategy Analyst at Mercado Libre, the leading e-commerce company in Latin America, where I provided financial and strategic support to the retail commercial team in Chile. In this role, I used tools such as SQL, Tableau, Looker, and Data Suite to analyze and present business results, profitability of new opportunities, and control retail business health. I also contributed to improving forecasting processes and inventory and sales management. 

Before that, I was a Planning Analyst at Prisma Medios de Pago, where I developed and analyzed performance indicators for the Operations area. 

And my previous experience was in Accenture, where I worked as Client Fianancial Management Analyst, where I delivered financial support to the commercial team in Brazil, ensuring to maximize the profitability of various contracts.

My professional goal is to continue growing and learning in the field of business planning, and commercial analysis, bringing value to the organizations I work with, and collaborating with multidisciplinary and dynamic teams.
element.topSkills: Business Planning • Forecasting • Análisis de datos • Gestión de ventas

headline: Attorney-at-Law (Germany & Spain) | International Inheritance Law | Real Estate Law
about:
Abogada con colegiación en España y Alemania, especializada en Derecho Internacional de Sucesiones y Derecho Inmobiliario.

Gracias a mi amplia experiencia en materia sucesoria, desde hace muchos años asesoro y represento a administradores de herencias, prestigiosos despachos de abogados especializados en sucesiones, así como a organizaciones internacionales y ONGs en complejos procedimientos hereditarios transfronterizos. Como miembro de NDEEX formo parte de una red europea de destacados expertos en sucesiones y participo habitualmente en casos de gran complejidad con dimensión internacional.

Asimismo, asesoro en Derecho Inmobiliario español, desde la due diligence hasta la redacción de contratos y la formalización notarial de las operaciones.

Mi doble colegiación me permite acompañar a los clientes de forma integral en ambos sistemas jurídicos y ofrecer soluciones a medida.

Mi compromiso: máxima calidad técnica, comunicación clara y soluciones prácticas para clientes que actúan en un contexto internacional.
topSkills: Derecho sucesorio • Derecho internacional • Español • English • German

headline: Operador de Trafico
about:
Mis últimos 7 años, he desempeñado labores administrativas enfocadas en la gestión de registros y documentos para asegurar el cumplimiento de nuestros proveedores, de acuerdo a los estándares requeridos por la empresa. También he sido responsable de la atención telefónica a clientes y proveedores.
Además, he llevado a cabo la gestión de la facturación tanto a proveedores como a clientes, realizando un seguimiento mensual y anual para lograr los objetivos establecidos por la empresa. Mi labor también ha incluido la búsqueda de nuevas oportunidades de negocio, así como la implementación y mejora continua de procesos para optimizar el funcionamiento de la empresa.
topSkills: Organización y planificación • Trabajo en equipo • Orientación al cliente • Comunicación oral y escrita positiva. • Competencia digital.

experience.description:
•	Gestión administrativa del tráfico terrestre: planificación de rutas, asignación de repartos y coordinación de recogidas mediante los sistemas AS400 y Senda.
	•	Solicitud de citas para entregas en grandes superficies y plataformas logísticas, asegurando el cumplimiento de los procedimientos establecidos.
	•	Atención a destinatarios, brindando asistencia en la resolución de incidencias y consultas relacionadas con el servicio.
	•	Elaboración y envío de reportes operativos a otras plazas de Schenker en Iberia, facilitando la trazabilidad de los envíos.
	•	Seguimiento diario de entregas y recogidas, asegurando el cumplimiento de los plazos y optimizando la operativa de transporte.

•	Coordinación de equipo administrativo y operativo, con seguimiento de agenda y control de gestión.
	•	Planificación de ruteos, logística de entregas y resolución de desvíos en la operación.
	•	Gestión y control de documentación de transporte, remitos y facturación a clientes.
	•	Reportes de resultados y cumplimiento de objetivos a Gerencia y Región.
	•	Desarrollo de nuevos proyectos operativos y búsqueda de clientes y proveedores estratégicos.

•	Planificación y seguimiento de rutas en Buenos Aires y viajes nacionales e internacionales a países limítrofes.
	•	Coordinación y monitoreo de traslados de contenedores IMPO/EXPO.
	•	Atención a clientes y proveedores sobre operaciones de tráfico.
	•	Monitoreo de flota mediante GPS y comunicación directa con conductores.
	•	Elaboración de cotizaciones para proyectos y nuevas operaciones logísticas.

•       Planificación, coordinación y seguimiento de rutas de distribución (clientes: L’Oréal Argentina y Danfoss).
	•	Facturación a clientes y proveedores; mantenimiento y actualización de bases de datos y sistemas logísticos.
	•	Comunicación con proveedores y transportistas para asegurar el cumplimiento de entregas.
	•	Resolución de incidencias operativas y toma de decisiones en situaciones imprevistas.
	•	Propuesta e implementación de mejoras en la organización y uso de recursos.

Participó de manera activa en entrenamientos de metodologias Lean y Kaizen, para luego proponer ideas de mejora que transformó en proyectos junto al equipo, con resultados comprobados.

receivedRecommendations.description: Matías es un excelente profesional en su area. Coincidimos laboralmente en distintas áreas, pero que requerían un trabajo en conjunto. Donde demostró su capacidad de liderazgo, conocimiento de su área y sobre todo ser un excelente compañero.

receivedRecommendations.description: Asertivo y orientado a resultados.

receivedRecommendations.description: trabajamos juntos en la compañia ofreciendo servicio terrestre a nuestros clientes, tanto en las gestiones de liberacion aduanera de importacion como retiros de exportacion para su consolidacion en depositos fiscales. Tambien hemos trabajado en brindar servicios de entrega domestica en tiendas y locales a importantes clientes de la compañia. Es un gran profesional y siempre intentando trabajar en equipo para mejorar dia a dia.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Gerente de Operaciones en SP2 Group
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: April 5, 2024, Carlos Martín managed Matias directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
Con Matías trabajamos mas de 5 años juntos, en todo ese tiempo demostró ser una persona capaz, enfocado en su trabajo y rindiendo en un alto nivel en lo que respecta a sus tareas y responsabilidades.
Cuando salí de la compañía, Matías tenía el puesto de jefe de tráfico y creo que no me equivocarme al decir que está para mas.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Analista de Transporte en Schenker S.A.
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: April 5, 2024, Johana reported directly to Matias
receivedRecommendations.description: Matías se distingue por su excelente trato, respeto y responsabilidad en todas sus funciones. Su enfoque en obtener resultados rápidos impulsa constantemente a su equipo a superar expectativas y a esforzarse un poco más. Además, su orientación hacia el desarrollo personal y profesional se refleja en su capacidad para transmitir conocimientos de manera efectiva, proporcionando oportunidades tangibles para el crecimiento dentro del departamento. Su liderazgo y compromiso con la excelencia lo convierten en un activo invaluable para cualquier equipo.

receivedRecommendations.givenAt: April 5, 2024, Juan Pablo worked with Matias but on different teams
receivedRecommendations.description: Matias es una excelente profesional. Siempre está buscando poder ofrecer el mejor servicio con un alto nivel de conocimiento y mucha actitud para meterse de lleno ante nuevos desafíos.

receivedRecommendations.description: Perfil proactivo, ampliamente recomendable.

receivedRecommendations.description: He tenido el placer de compartir experiencias laborales junto a Matías... excelente profesional, líder, responsable, orientado siempre a ofrecer el mejor servicio al cliente...te quiero siempre en mi equipo Mati...!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Analista de Calidad | Optimización de Procesos | Lean, Six Sigma & Análisis de Datos

receivedRecommendations.description:
Con Matías trabajamos mas de 5 años juntos, en todo ese tiempo demostró ser una persona capaz, enfocado en su trabajo y rindiendo en un alto nivel en lo que respecta a sus tareas y responsabilidades.
Cuando salí de la compañía, Matías tenía el puesto de jefe de tráfico y creo que no me equivocarme al decir que está para mas.

receivedRecommendations.description: Matías se distingue por su excelente trato, respeto y responsabilidad en todas sus funciones. Además, su orientación hacia el desarrollo personal y profesional se refleja en su capacidad para transmitir conocimientos de manera efectiva, proporcionando oportunidades tangibles para el crecimiento dentro del departamento. Su liderazgo y compromiso con la excelencia lo convierten en un activo invaluable para cualquier equipo.

headline: Packaging Supply Chain at SanLucar Fruit
about:
Ingeniero Industrial y graduado del Máster en Dirección de Marketing y Gestión Comercial en la Cámara de Comercio. 

Me considero un profesional que busca continuamente nuevos desafíos, pro activo y dinámico. Creo que la clave del éxito está en la motivación dentro de la empresa, trabajando en equipo y con objetivos desafiantes.

profileTopEducation.schoolName: Escuela de Negocios Lluís Vives.- Cámara Valencia

experience.description:
Supply chain management.
Packaging materials buyer.
Project management and development of new products.
Campaign planning and constant monitoring during its development.
Communication with suppliers, producers, commercials and internal and external clients.
Management of national and international transports.

Analysis and identification of the purchasing needs in order to ensure its correct management. Constant search for improvement opportunities. 
Participation in the implementation of defined projects with suppliers, ensuring calendars and participation of the different members of the multifunctional teams. 
Support to the factory's Finance Department during the Balance sheet period in everything related to Purchasing Management.

Conducting of sourcing strategies and negotiations for the HR, trade marketing and
marketing departments. Including annual services, consolidated purchases for specific
campaigns and one shot purchases. Constant negotiations with POP materials
suppliers due to the Argentinian peso sustained devaluation.

Analyze internal needs, external markets and cost structures to support the definition
and formulation of sourcing scenarios/strategies for Human Resources, Internal
Control, Professional Services, Brands, Finance:
Collect and consolidate affiliate spend data and products specifications for the assigned categories
Collect and analyze cost model and cost elements to identify main cost drivers
Prepare and conduct RFIs, RFPs and RFQs.
Support in setting cost saving targets and standards of quality.
Establish and maintain working relationships with peers of others affiliates and global
level to ensure activities are carried out in an optimal way.

Supply Chain Department. Monitoring and development of current and future
suppliers. Stock control. Tracking of the entire procurement process of critical
materials. Creation of purchase requests, purchase orders and activation of
deliveries.

education.description: Master in Marketing and Commercial Management

education.schoolName: Pontificia Universidad Católica Argentina 'Santa María de los Buenos Aires'​

education.description: Whole 2015 as an exchange student at the University of Arizona

education.degree: Bilingual bachelor with orientation in Exact Sciences
education.insights: Activities and societies: First XV Rugby Team

certifications.title: IGCSE International Certificate of Education in First Language (Spanish), English, Biology, Art, Business Studies and Mathematics

headline: Co-Founder & Business Owner | IXINA La Eliana
about:
Como Ingeniero Mecánico y Técnico Mecánico cuento con más de 15 años de experiencia en la rama industrial, teniendo como misión garantizar la eficiencia, rentabilidad y calidad de los procesos y productos de la compañía. 

Me dedico a desarrollar y supervisar los indicadores de productividad (KPIs), realizar la planificación de la producción, velar por el cumplimiento de las normativas legales y de seguridad, realizar la proyección del presupuesto de la compañía (Budget) y gestionar las relaciones con clientes y proveedores. Además, fomento dentro de la empresa una cultura organizativa positiva, proactiva y de aprendizaje continuo, impulsando la capacitación y la posible rotación del personal.

Entre mis competencias, se destacan la resolución de problemas, el control de calidad, la gestión de compras, la negociación, la ingeniería de procesos, el análisis de costes, la gestión del mantenimiento preventivo y correctivo, y la atención al cliente. 

Cuento con habilidades de liderazgo, comunicación, negociación, organización y planificación, que me permiten trabajar en equipo logrando resultados individuales y colectivos. Soy una persona comprometida, motivada y orientada a la mejora continua, que busca aportar valor a la empresa y a sus clientes.
topSkills: Ingeniería industrial • Liderazgo de equipos multidisciplinarios • Negociación • Resolución de conflictos • Dirección general

experience.position: Director of Strategy and Corporate Development
experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
• Change Management and Organizational Restructuring:
- Design and implementation of a comprehensive business restructuring, aligned with strategic objectives and operational needs.
- Leadership in the transition towards a more efficient operating model, improving the management structure, promoting collaboration and internal communication.
- Effective communication of the benefits of transformations at all organizational levels, achieving acceptance and commitment.

• Optimization of Processes and Training:
- Implementation of continuous improvement strategies to standardize and optimize operations in technical-engineering and commercial areas.
- Design of continuous training programs, promoting the development of key competencies and the adoption of new work methodologies.

• Brand Strategy and Positioning:
- Development and implementation of integrated marketing campaigns that consolidated the company's position as a benchmark in premium furniture.
- Leadership in digital strategies, generation of valuable content and optimization of communication channels to attract and retain customers.

• Innovation and Strategic Growth:
- Adoption and supervision of new technologies and tools that optimized critical processes and workflows.
- Redefinition of teams and functions to maximize efficiency and internal collaboration.

• Management by Results:
- Continuous monitoring and analysis of strategic KPIs, ensuring the fulfillment of goals and promoting sustainable growth.

element.headline: Co-Founder & Business Owner | IXINA La Eliana
element.about:
Como Ingeniero Mecánico y Técnico Mecánico cuento con más de 15 años de experiencia en la rama industrial, teniendo como misión garantizar la eficiencia, rentabilidad y calidad de los procesos y productos de la compañía. 

Me dedico a desarrollar y supervisar los indicadores de productividad (KPIs), realizar la planificación de la producción, velar por el cumplimiento de las normativas legales y de seguridad, realizar la proyección del presupuesto de la compañía (Budget) y gestionar las relaciones con clientes y proveedores. Además, fomento dentro de la empresa una cultura organizativa positiva, proactiva y de aprendizaje continuo, impulsando la capacitación y la posible rotación del personal.

Entre mis competencias, se destacan la resolución de problemas, el control de calidad, la gestión de compras, la negociación, la ingeniería de procesos, el análisis de costes, la gestión del mantenimiento preventivo y correctivo, y la atención al cliente. 

Cuento con habilidades de liderazgo, comunicación, negociación, organización y planificación, que me permiten trabajar en equipo logrando resultados individuales y colectivos. Soy una persona comprometida, motivada y orientada a la mejora continua, que busca aportar valor a la empresa y a sus clientes.
element.topSkills: Ingeniería industrial • Liderazgo de equipos multidisciplinarios • Negociación • Resolución de conflictos • Dirección general

experience.description:
• Change Management and Organizational Restructuring:
- Design and implementation of a comprehensive business restructuring, aligned with strategic objectives and operational needs.
- Leadership in the transition towards a more efficient operating model, improving the management structure, promoting collaboration and internal communication.
- Effective communication of the benefits of transformations at all organizational levels, achieving acceptance and commitment.

• Optimization of Processes and Training:
- Implementation of continuous improvement strategies to standardize and optimize operations in technical-engineering and commercial areas.
- Design of continuous training programs, promoting the development of key competencies and the adoption of new work methodologies.

• Brand Strategy and Positioning:
- Development and implementation of integrated marketing campaigns that consolidated the company's position as a benchmark in premium furniture.
- Leadership in digital strategies, generation of valuable content and optimization of communication channels to attract and retain customers.

• Innovation and Strategic Growth:
- Adoption and supervision of new technologies and tools that optimized critical processes and workflows.
- Redefinition of teams and functions to maximize efficiency and internal collaboration.

• Management by Results:
- Continuous monitoring and analysis of strategic KPIs, ensuring the fulfillment of goals and promoting sustainable growth.

headline: JD Edwards CNC Administrator
about:
Profesional de IT con más de 20 años de experiencia en implementaciones globales de JDE E1, implementaciones regionales como Administrador de CNC y Administrador de Seguridad. Amplia experiencia en arquitectura JDE, seguridad, control de cambios y ambientes monitoreados por SOX en el sector salud. Coordinación y gestión de soporte remoto de nivel 1 y 2.

Especialidades: JD Edwards EnterpriseOne, QSoftware, SQL Server, Oracle database sobre plataformas Windows, Linux y Unix.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Senior Managing Consultant
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: April 23, 2013, Juan Carlos worked with Daniel on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: Daniel is a great JDE Security Consultant, I worked with him on the Baxter LATAM project, he is very responsible and skilled to accomplish his project tasks. He is a great asset to any organization. I wish him all the best for his future endeavors.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Consultor independiente en ALTEKNAS
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: December 31, 2010, Walter and Daniel studied together
receivedRecommendations.description:
Daniel es un excelente profesional , reservado y muy aplicado para resolver problemas complejos .

Walter Keuthen

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Global IT Manager | JDE Tech PM | 24/7 Service Operations Manager | Cross-cultural Team Leadership
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: September 22, 2010, Claudio reported directly to Daniel
receivedRecommendations.description: Conozco a Daniel desde hace mas de 10 años y siempre ha demostrado ser un excelente profesional y excelente persona. Hemos compartido importantes proyectos regionales donde puso en practica su calificado conocimiento en tecnologia world-class y de los procesos del negocio. A nivel personal, siempre demostro responsabilidad, dedicacion, actitud positiva y excelente trato, en todos los niveles. Ha sido sido un placer haber trabajado con él y espero poder hacerlo nuevamente.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Global Enterprise Architect, MDD Supply Chain at Johnson & Johnson
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: August 26, 2010, Bernie worked with Daniel but on different teams
receivedRecommendations.description:
Daniel has an expert knowledge of JD Edwards and other ERP systems, including their design, construct, performance management and optimization. He performed this job admirably for several JDE instances at J&J, routinely identifying problems and opportunities were unknown to the vendor.

One of Daniel's unique skills is his ability to identify and tune performance issues at multiple layers of the ERP stack, including O/S, database, web, application and integrations. Few people that I have met are as proficient in this capacity.

He also has a unique ability to anticipate customer requirements and act on them independently. I have always known Daniel to be a highly motivated, self-starter who is all delivers far, far more than the client expected. He also works very well with business partners to manage expectations and relationships. In short, he is a rare person who is both technically gifted and skilled at managing business relationships.
